story:
In a Nutshell

Imagine a full conscious #joyMoVement, that physically UPlifts and enthuses thousands (millions) of folks across the globe, who in turn step up, and enthuse more loVe & joy with ALL!

In partnership with The UPliftment Programme (www.theup.org.za - An inspired Public Benefit organisation rooted in SA, active since 2003), we are expanding our joyous outreach to reach "all the people of the planet".

  • We intend to officially start touring in December 2015. First steps - include raising resources for the theatre truck, staging & filming equipment, as well as transport, to help us reach over 5000 people locally in South Africa, and share joyous action footage every few days online.
  • We are literally showing UP, to be the change we wish to see in the world. We've  created #HaHaHee (The Laughter Song), with the intention of raising millions, whilst simultaneously growing joy globally. 
  • We will follow up "the laughter song", with the launch of three UPLIFTING Online TV SHOWS... "Conscious Cooking with Brett", "HumaniTEA with Nikki" and "The WOWders"- (showcasing the people in the world who make you say "WOW" for the difference they make).


What We Need & What You Get

To run our pilot programme in December 2015 - we will need $32 000 (Thirty Two Thousand Dollars)

  • We have loads of wonderful ways to reward you, including #joymoVement merchandise, books and even opportunities to join us on the road.
  • This U$32 000 SmileStone allows us to purchase or adapt a second-hand truck  / trailer to be a mobile theatre, stage and TV recording studio. 
  • It will also cover our costs to travel around the Garden Route, uplifting communities during 2 weeks of the holiday season and also inspiring BIG TIME support for OUR MAIN GAME!
OUR MAIN GAME

    Our ultimate intention is to tour the world for 5 years with at least 28 other #voluntourists. Together we will focus the first two years on Southern Africa, joyously and holistically UPlifting communities as we move. To make this dream a reality we will need at at least 2 big trucks.

  1. For staging and equipment  
  2. For transporting and accomodating at least 28 #veganvolunteers.
Collectively then - we will:
  • Deliver weekly episodes of UPlifting and inspiring content for broadcast
  • Bring upliftment, support and care to communities, focusing on schools, hospitals and orphanges... (including and not limited to:  joyous edu-taining theatre, conscious cinema, music and care clowning for communities. We will also deliver life-skills and joy training, build greenhouses, paint and maintain buildings and always we will clean up trash etc)
The Impact is more joyfully active humanity and with UPlifted moods, folks are more likely to serve others and co-create solutions for our shifting times.

We've done 3 joy tours over the last 3 years and reached over 10 000 people collectively. This was before we had such a strong media arm, and so now we're ready to take it the extra SMile!!

The Impact is - more JOY

We are ALL passionate social-innovators, we can clearly see the need for more hands on showcasing of the #WinWinWin effect of service orientated work.

  • We envision a world where everyone is so joyous, they inspired to say "YAY" and actually be that way.
  • We see the joyMovement as a medium to support ALL those current catalysts of change and enthusers of loVe & joy and inspire them to keep it UP.
  • We are ready to show the world loVe and Joy is possible and actually a choice for us all.

Risks & Challenges

We're big advocates of "what you think about - you bring about" - so we don't like to focus on these things, but we have considered the following:

  • Not raising sufficient resources... We would use what vehicles we have and still do the tour, with a smaller group of volunteers.
  • Political Climate and Civil Unrest - could be a challenge if we've set a date for an area and then it becomes un-safe... We would change plans and visit the area another time.
  • A Vehicle breaks down or is in an accident, we have a two very handy men on tour with us, and if they can't manage, then we'd change plans and stay put - untill we can move on again.

You could also help by:

The way we see it - the more we share joy and loVe - the more joy and loVe there will be...

  • You could  share our campaign and inspire your peeps to contribute
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools

THANKS for reading, sharing and supporting. And with wings and a prayer... Here's hoping you ALL would loVe to see loVe & Joy grow in the world and you're willing to co-create a global #joyMoVement...

THE TIME IS NOW!

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Mr. Five will dieses Album produzieren und als amtliche Scheibe heraus bringen. Jedoch keine CD, sondern die gute alte Vinylplatte.

Wir haben uns bereits so oft darüber Gedanken gemacht, wie wir ohne Plattenfirma und Knebelverträge trotzdem zu einem gut produzierten Album kommen. Das ist uns bisher aus finanzieller Ermangelung nicht gelungen. Nun haben wir uns für das Crowdfunding entschieden, um die finanzielle Eigenleistung etwas eindämmen zu können und damit letztendlich dieser große Wunsch doch in Erfüllung geht. Eine ganz normale CD kam für uns auch nicht in Frage. Sie passt nicht zu unserer Musik und zu unserem Stil. Es muss ein richtiges Retro-Album werden, weshalb wir uns entschieden haben, eine Vinyl-Platte pressen zu lassen. Helft uns dabei, diesen Wunsch wahr werden zu lassen und wir belohnen jeden Unterstützer ab 20€ mit einem handsignierten Exemplar.

 

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Jeder der das Projekt mit mindestens 20€ unterstützt, bekommt das Album gratis und handsigniert von Mr. Five! Zusätzlich wird ein kostenloser Download bereit gestellt, damit man sich das Album auch ohne Plattenspieler anhören kann ;)

(Eine kleine Stückzahl CD's wird jedoch auch produziert)

Außerdem wird jeder (Zustimmung vorausgesetzt) zusätzlich im Booklet aufgelistet, der mit mehr als 100€ unterstützt und hat sich damit auf diesem Album als Unterstützer verewigt!

Wer mehr als 200€ investiert, wird zusätzlich am Weiterverkauf des Albums mit 5% vom Gewinn von 1000 verkauften Exemplaren beteiligt und als Investor genannt.

Die Folgen

Was passiert, wenn wir unser gestecktes Ziel nicht erreichen?

Dann gilt das Projekt zumindest vorerst als gescheitert und wir können das Album nicht produzieren, da wir keine Ausschüttung bekommen.

Verliere ich mein Investment, wenn das Projekt scheitert?

Nein. Wenn wir die angegebene Summe nicht erreichen, wird das Geld automatisch zurückgebucht. Erreichen wir das Ziel, kann das Album produziert werden.

Wie sicher ist, dass nach erreichen des Ziels das Album auch wirklich produziert wird?

Letztendlich ist es ja ein Investment und Vertrauenssache. Dieses Album ist unser größter Wunsch und wir werden alles daran setzen, diesen auch umzusetzen. Natürlich können immer Dinge passieren, die uns die Produktion unmöglich machen. Dann werden die Investoren auf Wunsch jedoch in vollem Umfang entschädigt, sollte sich das Projekt auch anderweitig nicht realisieren lassen. Wir werden das Geld dann nicht einfach behalten! 

Was passiert, wenn das Ziel übertroffen wird?

Dann sind wir froh, mit weniger Eigenleistung einsteigen zu müssen und können das Album noch hochwertiger produzieren. Also trotzdem eine WIN/WIN Situation.

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Natürlich ist dieses Vorhaben sehr gewagt und wir müssen nach der Hürde, Investoren zu finden, auch noch das Album produzieren. Das bedeutet, in ein Profi-Studio gehen und die Aufnahmen produzieren. Dann die Pressungen in Auftrag geben und das Label gestalten.

Da wir uns aber bereits riesig auf diese Herausforderung freuen und die Songs ja bekanntermaßen schon fertig sind, müessen wir nur noch kreativ werden. Dann steht der endgültigen Produktion nichts weiter im Wege. 
 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

 

Manche können einfach keinen Beitrag leisten, das heißt aber nicht, dass sie nicht helfen können:

Dann könnt ihr der Welt über unser Projekt erzählen, den Link teilen und andere zum helfen animieren - das ist mindestens genauso viel wert!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, my name is REY.

 I'm from Romania, Bucharest, and I want to show-off my project so-far.

REYNASTERRA - is the album that will contain the most well-written lyrics ever heard over boom-bap, trap, trip-hop instrumentals. The style is formed around an ego-rap base, as the 'game' imposes, with doses of fun, cultural references.  

Album cover explained: It contains 4 major elements. The first one is the green-shaded background in order to show respect for the best artist in the present Kendrick Lamar.The second element is the "Seven Society" emblem. After my research, I think they are the undercover heroes of our world. I have no real connections to them, and I don't want them to find this use disrespectful. The third element is the old Parental Advisory logo. I found it funny (ha) because It will remind me of my group 10Tone. (Tone of this record, unsuitable for minors). Oh, and it will be just for the design of the album cover, because I'm not intending to use any foul, explicit language in any of my songs. The last element, is the font that I've used in order to type my name and Reynasterea. Its called DacianDonarium, because of my dacian roots. 

This album WILL drop on 7 August.  A sample of the sound that I'm going to use can be heard here: 7AMOLXE Original Cut: https://youtu.be/Frj7R_q5H2s

What will I do with the raised-money? I got to invest in recording this album. It is written, 7 tracks but I want to use the highest sound-recording devices in order to complete and succeed. I will also pay photographers, PR-s, camera-mans, editors and for the multiplying the CD in the best physical form. I plan to produce 3 videos this summer, and with your help, I can make it faster and better looking. 

Stay in touch with me: https://facebook.com/reyandrei or on instagram @reyandrei

Of course I need help in any way possible such as subscribers on YouTube, likes, etc. But above all this, I need you to listen to my music and let it decide for me.  Did you learn something from my experience? That's the whole point of any art-form. 

If you trust me, you'll roll with me.

Thanks for your time and see you soon!

REY
story_txt: Short SummaryHello, my name is REY. I'm from Romania, Bucharest, and I want to show-off my project so-far.REYNASTERRA - is the album that will contain the most well-written lyrics ever heard over boom-bap, trap, trip-hop instrumentals. The style is formed around an ego-rap base, as the 'game' imposes, with doses of fun, cultural references.  Album cover explained: It contains 4 major elements. The first one is the green-shaded background in order to show respect for the best artist in the present Kendrick Lamar.The second element is the "Seven Society" emblem. After my research, I think they are the undercover heroes of our world. I have no real connections to them, and I don't want them to find this use disrespectful. The third element is the old Parental Advisory logo. I found it funny (ha) because It will remind me of my group 10Tone. (Tone of this record, unsuitable for minors). Oh, and it will be just for the design of the album cover, because I'm not intending to use any foul, explicit language in any of my songs. The last element, is the font that I've used in order to type my name and Reynasterea. Its called DacianDonarium, because of my dacian roots. This album WILL drop on 7 August.  A sample of the sound that I'm going to use can be heard here: 7AMOLXE Original Cut: https://youtu.be/Frj7R_q5H2sWhat will I do with the raised-money? I got to invest in recording this album. It is written, 7 tracks but I want to use the highest sound-recording devices in order to complete and succeed. I will also pay photographers, PR-s, camera-mans, editors and for the multiplying the CD in the best physical form. I plan to produce 3 videos this summer, and with your help, I can make it faster and better looking. Stay in touch with me: https://facebook.com/reyandrei or on instagram @reyandreiOf course I need help in any way possible such as subscribers on YouTube, likes, etc. But above all this, I need you to listen to my music and let it decide for me.  Did you learn something from my experience? That's the whole point of any art-form. If you trust me, you'll roll with me.Thanks for your time and see you soon!REY

story:
Vote 4 Pedro is a campaign to help get me out to NY & Atlanta to perform.

I'm an Aspiring MC/Songwriter from Jersey City, NJ. Based out of Honolulu, HI, I recently released an album called "Car Tunes" that landed me a spot at a prestigious event called "The Rock The Mic Showcase" in New York. This event is a competition for rappers to showcase their talent in front a panel of respected/renowned judges that can lead to signing a major record label deal. I was emailed personally by the host DJ Absolut to attend. 

Also, my album was curated by a company called Coast 2 Coast to see if my music had what it takes to perform in a musical recording studio in an intimate environment for Bigga Rankin in Atlanta. Bigga Rankin is responsible for breaking out artists such as Yo Gotti, YFN Lucci, and 2 Chainz. 

I'm raising the funds to cover Flights, Lodging, and Rental Car.

story:
Short Summary

Why, hello there! :-)
My name is Naida Lynn and I am a Haitian-American, singer/songwriter based in South Florida! 

You ever come to a place where you're tired of letting fear of failure or rejection run your life? Tired of hiding who you are and ready to just get real already?--embracing your identity & every God-given dream with confidence? Well that's my story and there's a soundtrack for that now! ha

In my most compelling work yet, I tackle subjects like letting go of toxic relationships, reconnecting with my Haitian roots, and the process of finally believing that my truest self is good enough. In this project, I sing the tune that every heart cries but need YOUR help to get this music out there. 

What We Need & What You Get

So far, I have paid all the front-end costs to record 6 of the 7 songs that will be on this EP but now need an additional $4,000 to pay for the remainder of production (ie, mixing & mastering), as well as funds for digital distribution, album printing, marketing and promotions.

More specifically:
---Record final song - $500
---Mixing & Mastering - $2000 
---Digital Distribution - $100 
---Album Printing - $500 
---Marketing & promotions - $900 (ie, merch, online marketing, touring, etc.) 

My deadline to raise this by is October 31st. 

IN RETURN FOR DONATING TO THIS PROJECT, I am pleased to offer various insider perks including exclusive music releases, signed merchandise, a song written in your honor & more!

Risks & Challenges

I have definitely gone out on a limb with this one--essentially putting all of my eggs into this one basket! Why? Because I believe in the message and believe that my story will help people everywhere to rise again after hitting rock bottom. What began as a way for me to wear my heart on my vocal chords is not the tale of a powerful journey from struggle to peaceful self-discovery. 

My greatest risk here would be getting to this point (recording all of these lovely songs) but not being able to afford to polish them & get them out to the world! But this is where you come in and can help make this dream a reality! 

Between 2 fundraising concerts I'm planning as well as the support of friends & family, I believe that I will reach my goal and impact tons of people. Would you consider donating today? 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you've read down this far but aren't able to contribute financially, don't be discouraged! You can STILL help out & here's how: 

#1: Get the word out!! Share this page and hashtag #TeamRoyaLynn so we can keep track. 
#2: Pray for me! Pray that all the needed funds come through and that this music makes a difference for people everywhere. 
#3: Finally, once my music, lyric videos and music videos come out, please share!! 

Thanks again for who you are and for your willingness to follow my journey! Here's to new adventures and beautiful stories of humans that love themselves and others well.

story:
¡Bien venidos todos! ¡Sabroso y Caliente aquí saludándolos! Soy Hector Arenas, fundador, director musical y cantante autor de SyC. Empezó hace 10 anos con 3 integrantes y ahora somos 9 integrantes con 5 discos publicados. Somos gracias a Dios y ustedes uno de los mejores grupos en la región. Yo desarrollo un estilo novato y único que se llama Changuero Urbano. Es una mezcla de música muy costeña y ritmos latinos.

Nuestra campaña es muy simple.  Queremos llevar nuestra música a más gente, expandir nuestra distribución, y completar nuestro sexto disco. A lo demás, tenemos programado cuatro videos a acompañar nuestro nuevo disco. ¡Claro que tenemos videos, pero es hora de que llevarlos a un nuevo nivel para ustedes! Solamente queremos darles lo mejor de nosotros, sobre todo darles de puro corazón. Ustedes lo merecen lo mejor que podemos dar. ¡Y por supuesto queremos llegar a más fans!  Estamos planeando un tour a los Estados Unidos muy pronto y estamos esperando que todos ustedes nos apoyan a lograr ese meto a llevar nuestro estilo de música a nuestros paisanos en los Estados Unidos y a otros lugares alrededor del mundo que lleva México y América Latino en sus corazones y esperamos que también logramos llevar la importancia de proteger y difundir todas los estilos únicos de la música mundial.

 Ayudándonos a lograr nuestras metas nos permite a enfocar en ustedes nuestros fans. Estamos trabajando en amplificar nuestro base de fans, y estamos enfocados en gravando nuestro próximo CD con un alto nivel de profesionalismo y una vía de distribución más amplio aun, y los videos publicados conjunto con el CD nos ayudare a lograr nuestra meta aún más rápida.

Estamos calculando que necesitamos aproximadamente $30,000.00 pesos o $1,500.00 dólares US. Tenemos ya grabados varias tracks pero nos falta los nueve restantes a completar el CD. Y después claro a editar, mezclar y masterizar. Nosotros ya estamos en CD Baby, Reverbnation y Youtube, entonces tenemos varias vías de distribución ya en pie, pero necesitamos masterizar los videos profesionalmente también. De eso tenemos un presupuesto de aproximadamente $4000.00 pesos a cada uno y pensamos que es un muy buen presupuestó!

¡Queremos compartir todo que usted nos ayuda a lograr, entonces cualquier donación será recompensada! Proveemos un enlace a descargar una canción original, un CD, o tal vez un paquete de discos, y por las personas que nos ayuda mucho, ofrecemos mercancía de la banda como gorras, playeras, autografiadas, y varias combinaciones de lo mencionado.

Incluso si no hacemos todo el objetivo, todos los fondos se usarán para grabar y masterizar canciones y producir videos.

La música SyC está dando vida a un tipo de música costeña original. Refleja el corazón y el alma animados de los pueblos costeños de México, al tiempo que incorpora y muestra las maravillosas influencias de diversos estilos de música nativos de América Latina.

Este es nuestro primer ejercicio de crowdfunding, pero será nuestro sexto CD completo. Nuestra música se exhibió en la televisión matutina, se reprodujo en estaciones de radio en varias regiones, y puedes escuchar nuestra música en todas partes desde las tiendas hasta las playas y otras bandas que tocan nuestra música. ¡Despierta el baile en todos!

Todos sabemos que la industria de la música puede ser desafiante y un poco intimidante, y obtener tu música es un trabajo duro. Sabemos que se necesita más que solo talento. Requiere liderazgo y determinación también. Liderazgo que tenemos, y la determinación también. Todo lo que queda es el trabajo duro, y con fanáticos como el nuestro, trabajamos duro todos los días para ofrecerte lo mejor.

Héctor Arenas, fundador y director de Sabroso y Caliente, ha estado escribiendo y tocando música con éxito durante más de diez años. Tiene una amplia experiencia en música y composición, toca teclados, saxofón y guitarra, entre otros instrumentos. Estudió música formalmente en la universidad y ha trabajado junto con muchos otros artistas locales y regionales. Su experiencia abarca desde la mezcla y el dominio en el estudio hasta actuaciones en vivo en algunas áreas desafiantes. Su talento y empuje han reunido a un grupo muy fuerte de músicos, y juntos son uno de los grupos más buscados en la región.

Todos sabemos que la industria de la música puede ser desafiante y un poco intimidante, y obtener tu música es un trabajo duro. Sabemos que lleva más tiempo. Actualmente estamos trabajando en un kit de prensa actualizado y trabajando en plataformas de radio y transmisión en vivo para llegar a más personas. Estamos creando una mejor presencia en las redes sociales y material de video para mejorar nuestra presencia y nuestra experiencia con los fanáticos. ¡Definitivamente hay más por venir!

Entendemos que no todos pueden contribuir a nuestra campaña, ¡pero aún queremos estar en contacto con ustedes, nuestros fanáticos! ¡Si no puede contribuir financieramente, puede ayudarnos a correr la voz! Comparta nuestra campaña en su página de Facebook, cuénteles a sus amigos, como nuestra página de Facebook, consúltenos en Reverbnation, escúchenos en YouTube. Esperamos verte pronto y ¡gracias por tu apoyo! Recuerda, sin ti, nuestros fanáticos, no podríamos hacer lo que hacemos.

story:
The Project

My name is Febian Perez, and I'm the songwriter/frontman for Eclisse, a darker/heavier band based in Portland. Eclisse is influenced by such bands as: Deftones, Queens of the Stone Age, King Crimson, Sigur Ros, Radiohead, Mastodon and more...I spent a good part of last year writing and recording my first album "The Origin of Error", and I loved the process. The feeling of making something out of nothing is addictive, and I feel like my work ethic and creative skill-set has grown tenfold since the recording of our first album. I'm beyond excited to go back into the studio, with 8 new amazing songs and truly make something that will stand the test of time. By contributing to this project, you'll help me manifest the music in my head into an album which will ideally introduce my music into bigger markets.

What We Need & What You Get

I need $3,500 to fund this record. 11 days of studio time will run me about $3,000. Mastering will cost me about $250 and CD duplication will be about the same. The unique perks are super rad, from limited edition Vinyls of our first record and our upcoming second record, to custom songs written just for you and even potentially a private show in your home town!!

If the goal is not reached, all funds will go directly into studio costs.

To get an idea of the quality of work I bring to the table, please listen to these two songs from our first album!

Video for "Dark Dances"

 
Video for "Your Son"

 

Video of "The Origin of Error" Full Album

 

I make it my utmost priority, when in the studio, to complete the project at hand and give it my 100%. I spend many weeks doing pre-production, working on the songs and recording demos and constantly perfecting them before bringing it to the studio. This new album is heading into a much heavier direction, but staying very melodic and dynamic. I've been listening to a lot of different music to get my brain into gear... I'm pulling creative inspiration from many sources and I feel like this album is going to be a killer both musically and conceptually.

I'm recording this album with Jordan Richter, a talented Engineer who owns and operates Room 13 Recording Studios in Portland, OR. Jordan and I worked together on the first album, and have amazing creative chemistry together! Mastering will be done by Adam Gonsalves of Telegraph Mastering. Duplication will be done by Saturn CD Duplication.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest risk is potential delay with Vinyl productions, as most plants take months to turn around orders. I will to my best to maximize turn arounds by working with smaller plants if need be. The album itself is on a strict timeline, so there should be no delay in getting that recorded/mixed and mastered before the deadline.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're ready to contribute, just click the pink "Back It" button on the top right of this page! Every little bit counts, and I'm beyond thankful for your support.

If you've got folks in your network that would be interested in supporting us please help get the word out! 

Thank you so much for checking out my project page... I can't wait to record this new album and share it with everyone!!

story:
The Batmetal LIVE tour has been postponed. Don’t worry though! - everybody who backed is being refunded 100% of their pledge. Your funds will appear in your account within 5 working days.

Thankyou so much to everyone who showed their support and to all our backers. Without you there is no Batmetal!

What do I have to do to get my money back?
You don’t have to do anything! We have issued refunds for all backers (Including those who donated!) You should see the funds back in your account within 5 working days.

What happened!?
We would like to thank everyone who backed us and showed their support! You are all awesome! The sad truth is we didn’t raise enough to put on any of the live shows this time.

Will you consider trying again in the future?
Yes!  We are looking at how we can make a potential future Batmetal LIVE campaign a success. This has certainly been a learning experience for us, and there are definitely things we can do better next time.

Here are some of the things we would do different:
1. Start smaller. One show in one country + plus a livestream for our fans worldwide.
2. More exclusive perks (Back stage tours, dinner with the creators etc…)
3. More financial transparency

Does this affect Batmetal?
Nope! The Youtube series will go on as normal :)

What happens if I canceled the credit card I used to make my original contribution? How will I get my refund?
Your refunded contribution will still get sent back to your original credit card's issuing bank without issue. The issuing bank will determine how to get the funds to you:

If there is a balance owed on the card, it offsets the balance. If you opened up a different card, the issuer usually transfers the credit to the new account. Sometimes the issuer will cut a check to the customer. Regardless of which way the issuing bank handles this, the card issuer will handle reimbursing the backer. We recommend reaching out to your issuing bank if you have any questions about how you will be receiving a refund sent to your canceled credit card.

It’s been 5 days and I haven't received my refund!
1. Get in touch with indiegogo at: indiegogo.com/contact
2. Let us know in the comment section (Or email!) so we can also contact indiegogo. Our e-mail is: support@batmetallive.com

Thankyou everyone for your support!
- Batmetal LIVE team



BATMETAL LIVE!

SUBJECT... CHECK!
LOCATION... CHECK!
DESIRE... CHECK!
 


We're campaigning to make Batmetal Live a reality. We want to hire venues around the world to put on a special event celebrating all things metal. Every show will feature a live band of real musicians playing alongside a holographic Bats.

The show will also be professionally animated. It's important we match the level of quality of the excellent Batmetal videos! Holographic technology lets us take Bats and bring him to life onstage like you've never seen before!

Batmetal Live will feature the music of Dethklok, Metallica, Megadeth, Slayer, Nile, Iron maiden, and more! (Including fan suggested songs too! - stay tuned for that!)

We need your help to make this happen! Please share the campaign!

TOUR DATES

LONDON, ENGLAND - 26th November 2018
BERLIN, GERMANY - 29th November 2018
OSLO, NORWAY - 3rd December 2018
MOSCOW, RUSSIA - 6th December 2018
NEW YORK, USA - 12th December 2018
LOS ANGELES, USA - 18th December 2018

 

FAQ

What venues!?
Venues and travel information will be announced Mid May. We won't know exactly what venue to book until we know how many people are interested - which is why it is important to pledge your interest asap! All venues will be within a 10 mile radius of each city, with excellent transport links.

I don't understand! Why should I pledge without knowing the venue?
When you pledge you are letting us know you are interested and you can travel to the city. If 500 people pledge for a particular city - we can book a venue that holds 500. If 2000 people pledge, we can book somewhere bigger. Waiting to pledge until after we've announced venues is bad as it makes the numbers look smaller, thus the venue will be smaller, meaning we cannot guarantee your place!

What if you announce a venue and I no like it!?
No problem! We will happily refund your pledge(s)  - using indiegogo means there is no risk to you.

What if the show doesn't happen?
It's indiegogo - so you get 100% of your money back.

What kind of tickets are these?
Standing only.

I already donate to the ArhyBES patreon, can I have a ticket?
Funds donated to Patreon are for beer and animation. BATMETAL LIVE tickets can be pre-ordered exclusively via the campaign.

Can I take photos of the show?
Yes, but no flash please

Does the show use special FX?
Yes. Batmetal LIVE uses a variety of stage FX. Including STROBE and PYROTECHNICS.

How does it work?
BATMETAL LIVE uses top secret Wayne Enterprises holographic technology to bring the characters to life.

Is there disabled access?
Disabled access is available at all Batmetal LIVE Performances.

Can I bring children?
Under 14's MUST be accompanied by an adult.

What is your website?
www.batmetallive.com

I want to get in touch!
-->  support@batmetallive.com   <--
story_txt:
The Batmetal LIVE tour has been postponed. Don’t worry though! - everybody who backed is being refunded 100% of their pledge. Your funds will appear in your account within 5 working days.Thankyou so much to everyone who showed their support and to all our backers. Without you there is no Batmetal!
What do I have to do to get my money back?You don’t have to do anything! We have issued refunds for all backers (Including those who donated!) You should see the funds back in your account within 5 working days.
What happened!?We would like to thank everyone who backed us and showed their support! You are all awesome! The sad truth is we didn’t raise enough to put on any of the live shows this time.Will you consider trying again in the future?Yes!  We are looking at how we can make a potential future Batmetal LIVE campaign a success. This has certainly been a learning experience for us, and there are definitely things we can do better next time.
Here are some of the things we would do different:1. Start smaller. One show in one country + plus a livestream for our fans worldwide.2. More exclusive perks (Back stage tours, dinner with the creators etc…)3. More financial transparency
Does this affect Batmetal?Nope! The Youtube series will go on as normal :)
What happens if I canceled the credit card I used to make my original contribution? How will I get my refund?Your refunded contribution will still get sent back to your original credit card's issuing bank without issue. The issuing bank will determine how to get the funds to you:
If there is a balance owed on the card, it offsets the balance. If you opened up a different card, the issuer usually transfers the credit to the new account. Sometimes the issuer will cut a check to the customer. Regardless of which way the issuing bank handles this, the card issuer will handle reimbursing the backer. We recommend reaching out to your issuing bank if you have any questions about how you will be receiving a refund sent to your canceled credit card.It’s been 5 days and I haven't received my refund!1. Get in touch with indiegogo at: indiegogo.com/contact2. Let us know in the comment section (Or email!) so we can also contact indiegogo. Our e-mail is: support@batmetallive.comThankyou everyone for your support!- Batmetal LIVE team

story:
The Crew

Janelle Lawrence is excited to present "These Are Our Memories". Janelle Lawrence ​received her B.F.A. in Musical Theatre from Manhattanville College.​ In her career she has appeared in ANTIGONE with Love Creek Theatre Company, SHOWTUNE ​and SWINGTIME CANTEEN ​with direction by Mark Cherry​ and ​has ​worked on readings of VIEUX​ C​ARRE​ with direction and an appearance by Austin Pendleton produced by Mississippi Mud​. Janelle is currently in THE EXTRAORDINARY FALL OF THE FOUR LEGGED WOMAN by Lily Ali-Oshatz and Mark Galinovsky presented in the NYC Fringe Festival and currently running at the Off-Broadway Soho Playhouse Theatre. She identifies as a singer, dancer, librettist, and costume designer. For more information  visit www.janellelawrence.wix.com/janelle

Leslie is a Brooklyn-based pianist and music director from North Carolina. He received his BM in classical piano performance from UNC Chapel Hill, and loves all styles of playing, from jazz to folk to rock, and everything in between

Brian Falduto (Actor & Singer-Songwriter) is delighted to be making a guest appearance in Janelle Lawrence's "These Are Our Memories."  For more on Brian's upcoming appearances and recent involvements, visit www.brianfalduto.com.

Brian Fender-Shirley is a multi talented performing artist from South Florida. After doing many cabaret performances this month, he is excited to make his debut at the Metropolitan Room in his 4th show with Janelle. "As an artist, the job is to reflect on society while entertaining. We have the best, most important job in the world"

"Tell Us What The Money Is For"

  • Each performer will be paid for their performance
  • Each musician will be compensated for performance and rehearsals
  • Each performer will be available for an open reception that all are invited to attend.
  • Each performer will recite a personal thank you for your contribution to the arts community
  • Each donator is welcome to the reception and will receive a personal card and contact of each performer.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Purchase a ticket to donate to a friend or artist in the community!
  • Share our campaign with your friends and community!

 

We will be filming this cabaret with six cameras located in convenient areas of the space and the live broadcast will be edited IN REAL TIME.

story:
Hello Music Lovers!

I'm really happy and excited to finally bring this magic to life. 

My name is Brett Butler.

I'm a small town kid from Aurora, Canada (close to Toronto) and although I was never privileged, I never stopped believing in myself and my only goal is to be in a position where I can help others achieve their goals as well. 

It's only been me and my dad and as an only child I had to really learn how to be responsible early on and provide for myself. My dad tries everything to make me happy and works really hard every day. He tried putting me in golf with hopes of me going professional and although I was a good golfer, after some years he realized it was more of his dream rather than mine. He even tried to open up a business and get a business loan just to support my career, but didn't end up getting approved. It was actually his idea to try crowdfunding so that's what brings me here to reach out to all of you. 

In the past 2 years, I have been creating music, rehearsing, performing, and connecting with many people around the world online with the purpose of bringing people together through music, singing, and living the life of music. My music is heart felt and everyone says my music touches them and I want it to touch you as well.

I have been so unbelievably fortunate to connect with such amazing people including a project manager for AEG worldwide.

For so many years, many of you are asking me for these songs, for recordings, an album…Something you can listen and connect to…

Just this year, I recorded my most inspirational song "Love is the only thing I know" at Metalworks Studios in Mississauga, Canada.

Here's where you can listen to some of my music: https://www.brettbutlermusic.com

Instagram: @brettbutlermusic

 

Now it is time for more!!!

 

We have 40 days to make this magic happen!

The deadline for the campaign is June 10th! Let's make it happen!

 

Many of you have met me online and in person and I am very grateful and blessed that we shared so many beautiful moments.

Some of you are singing my songs and we have never met.

And some of you are totally new to my music.

This Album is for all of you!

And for that magic to happen, I need your help and support!

In today's new world, music is becoming more and more influential on today's youth. Rather then being mediated by Record Labels, more and more artists are choosing to communicate directly with their audiences, which is why they are choosing crowd funding platforms such as Indiegogo.

So, to make it simple. 

The "Never Get Old" Album is going to be recorded and made in Metalworks  - the place where I best create music, this coming summer/fall 2017!

The goal is to raise 20,000 Dollars for the creation of the Never Get Old Album.

And here is the Budget Breakdown:

15,000 Dollars:  Music production, recordings, mixing and mastering, musician sessions and traveling costs.

3,000 Dollars: Indiegogo fees and comission

1,000 Dollars: CD manufacturing

1,000 Dollars: Perks shipment 

Any extra money raised above this goal will go towards more Video, marketing and PR.

If you wish to Pre-Order the Album, you are warmly invited to go to the right of the page and choose the amount and perk you wish from the list of perks. 

I would like to say thank you for all of you who I am truly blessed to go on this journey with. 

Please help me to spread the word around and to get more and more people to hear about my project and music. 

If, for any reason, you cannot pre-order the Album or financially contribute to the project, there are other wonderful ways that you can help spreading the word of this creation.

Direct people to my IndieGogo page.

Share the campaign video on your FB page. There are some great sharing tools in the Indoegogo page.

Email your friends and family around the world.

Share with Music Magazines, websites and other music forums info about my music Never Get Old project and the upcoming Album.

Please tell your friends and family about the project because you will all truly enjoy it! :)

Sing the songs in your homes and cars while you travel!

Your help and support is so important for the making of this Album!

Thank you!

story:
THE CHRONOMASTER PROJECT is a science fiction music tale that contains current issues and several surprises in its development.

 

THE CHRONOMASTER PROJECT has a solid band on his back, formed by experienced musicians with a common purpose: give life to Fabio Rancati's story with a fresh songwriting that follows step by step the Cronomante's adventures through time and space.

The great number of guest singers, each one will play a different character, will result in a journey full of surprises. You'll experience moments full of great metal impact, but also majestic melodies and evocative refrain that will be your guide in space.

 


Fabio Rancati: story, producer
Lele Mr Triton: keyboards
Luigi Jamundo: main composer, guitars, bass
Giorgio Novarino: bass
Enrico “Erk” Scutti: vocals
Carlos Cantatore: drums
Leonardo Porcheddu: lead guitars
Douglas R. Docker: lyrics

Here some Q&A video for all of you!

 

GIANLUCA MASTRANGELO
from De la muerte

NINA OSEGUEDA
from A Sound of Thunder 

MIKE MILLS
from Ayreon

MARK BOALS
from Ring of fire

CHRIS BOLTENDAHL
from Grave Digger

VICKY PSARAKIS
from The agonist

AMANDA SOMERVILLE 
from Exit eden

MARCELA BOVIO
from Dark Horse White Horse

SNOWY SHAW

 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 
 
 

 
 
 

 

 
 
 

Below you'll find the perks that'll be active from the start: more may come during the campaign!

So stay tuned to monitor all the changes to the space time continuum made by the Chronomaster!

 - All pictures shown are for illustration purpose only. Actual products may vary due to product enhancement -

The DIGITAL PACK - early bird

For the faster guys in the galaxy, the chance to get your DIGITAL PACK at a super massive discounted price.

The perk includes:

  • Digital download of the album and booklet and an exclusive version of the song "Generation Clash" entirely sang by Mike Mills. This song is an exclusive for crowdfunding campaign backers.
  • Digital download of the wallpapers designed by our artist Andrea Alemanno.

 

The DIGITAL PACK

The perk includes:

  • Digital download of the album and booklet and an exclusive version of the song "Generation Clash" entirely sang by Mike Mills. This song is an exclusive for crowdfunding campaign backers.
  • Digital download of the wallpapers designed by our artist  Andrea Alemanno.

 

The GAMEBOOK - early bird

For gamebook lovers the chance to get your copy at a discounted price.

The perk includes:

  • Gamebook "The Android Messiah" (Italian or English) written by da Alex Calvi and realized with the collaboration of Edizioni Librarsi (http://www.edizionilibrarsi.it/), renowned italian publisher dedicated to gamebooks publication.
  • Digital download of the album and booklet and an exclusive version of the song "Generation Clash" entirely sang by Mike Mills. This song is an exclusive for crowdfunding campaign backers.
  • Digital download of the wallpapers designed by our artist Andrea Alemanno
     

The TRAVELLER PACK

Traveller, come join the Chronomaster for this fantastic adventure!

The perk includes:

  • Cd Digipack
  • Digital download of the album and booklet and an exclusive version of the song "Generation Clash" entirely sang by Mike Mills. This song is an exclusive for crowdfunding campaign backers.
  • Digital download of the wallpapers designed by our artist Andrea Alemanno.

 

The INVADERS PACK

For those who want to conquer the Universe, without fear or remorse in wiping out alien life forms!

The perk includes:

  • Cd Digipack
  • T-SHIRT availalble in  two colors: classic black, or white (note: white T-shirt is realized exclusively for this campaign!) Choose wisely, space colonist!
  • Digital download of the album and booklet and an exclusive version of the song "Generation Clash" entirely sang by Mike Mills. This song is an exclusive for crowdfunding campaign backers.
  • Digital download of the wallpapers designed by our artist Andrea Alemanno.

 

The CHRONOMASTER PACK

This is the Way...to a full Chronomaster experience!

The perk includes:

  • Cd Digipack
  • Gamebook "The Android Messiah" (Italian or English) written by da Alex Calvi and realized with the collaboration of Edizioni Librarsi (http://www.edizionilibrarsi.it/), renowned italian publisher dedicated to gamebooks publication.
  • Digital download of the album and booklet and an exclusive version of the song "Generation Clash"  entirely sang by Mike Mills. This song is an exclusive for crowdfunding campaign backers.
  • Digital download of the wallpapers designed by our artist Andrea Alemanno.

 

The TAU-1 PACK 

Do you want to become a TAU-1 inhabitant? Let us show you the way...

The perk includes:

  • Cd Deluxe (exclusively realized for this campaign!)
  • T-SHIRT availalble in  two colors: classic black, or white (note: white T-shirt is realized exclusively for this campaign!) Make your choice, citizen!
  • Gamebook "The Android Messiah" (Italian or English) written by da Alex Calvi and realized with the collaboration of Edizioni Librarsi (http://www.edizionilibrarsi.it/), renowned italian publisher dedicated to librogames publication.
  • Digital download of the album and booklet and an exclusive version of the song "Generation Clash" entirely sang by Mike Mills. This song is an exclusive for crowdfunding campaign backers.
  • Digital download of the wallpapers designed by our artist Andrea Alemanno.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Mastermind Fabio Rancati has already participated in various successful crowdfunding campaigns in other areas (comics, documentaries...) so this is not a first-time experience. That should reassure anyone who wants to trust us: we'll give everything we've got to be up to the expectations of this fantastic adventure.

We are at your complete disposal for any questions, suggestions or a simple email to let us know what you think about this project. If you think you can help us to make this project known, contact us...

Do you want to become a TAU-1 inhabitant? Let us show you the way...
The perk includes:


Cd Deluxe (exclusively realized for this campaign!)


T-SHIRT availalble in  two colors: classic black, or white (note: white T-shirt is realized exclusively for this campaign!) Make your choice, citizen!

Gamebook "The Android Messiah" (Italian or English) written by da Alex Calvi and realized with the collaboration of Edizioni Librarsi (http://www.edizionilibrarsi.it/), renowned italian publisher dedicated to librogames publication.

Digital download of the album and booklet and an exclusive version of the song "Generation Clash" entirely sang by Mike Mills. This song is an exclusive for crowdfunding campaign backers.
Digital download of the wallpapers designed by our artist Andrea Alemanno.

 

 

Risks & Challenges
Mastermind Fabio Rancati has already participated in various successful crowdfunding campaigns in other areas (comics, documentaries...) so this is not a first-time experience. That should reassure anyone who wants to trust us: we'll give everything we've got to be up to the expectations of this fantastic adventure.
We are at your complete disposal for any questions, suggestions or a simple email to let us know what you think about this project. If you think you can help us to make this project known, contact us...

story:
Every country in the world has acknowledged the existence of climate change, but it is still a debate in the US - a country that many look to as an example. The reality is that many of us live in a bubble of denial, perpetuated by corruption in the media and government, which desensitize the masses and regulate truth.

How can we feel empathy when we see the world through our devices, and other people feed us the reality they want us to believe? Time is ticking, and indifference towards the environment keeps  growing.

Science helps us understand facts, but music helps us experience them. Art helps us care about truths, which is why it can be a powerful medium for solving social and environmental issues. Because this cause calls for every person to become actively involved, the most effective solution will start with awakening the empathy of others.

How to awaken empathy? This is the first part of my solution: A project that combinesdeep human emotion, powerful lyrics and the vulnerability of the human voice.

“Our Only Home, an Opera for the Planet” is a project whose primary mission is to motivate people toward a sense of responsibility towards our earth. Using music as the vessel to deliver a message of collaboration and love for the environment will effectively spark a desire in the audience to take action.

The second part to my solution: to create a relationship between audience members and a non-profit organization. After becoming inspired, the audience would have access to the resources a non-profit organization can provide. Establishing this connection would allow the audience to develop their feelings into actions. When the significance of our actions are tangible and recognized, we are then encouraged to become and remain active participants in our community.

In February 2017, this project won the San Francisco’s Conservatory of Music Development Grant. Aside from boosting our social media signal, being awarded this grant drew the interest of Canadian artists and Mexican journalists, who wish to bring this project to their countries.

Artistically, we are well on our way, with the music composed, the libretto in nearly final stages, and a majority of necessary personnel recruited. Our next step is to consider logistics. What we need most is financial support, in order to compensate personnel, purchase materials for the production, rent a venue, and fund promotional materials.

Our musicians and community are eager and ready to get to work. We have the necessary talent and desire to create a project that will help change society, but we need the financial help to make this project feasible.

This is where YOU come in. Help us make a difference!

Remember... This is OUR ONLY HOME.

story:
Who are Heg & The Wolf Chorus?

Heg & The Wolf Chorus are a theatrical folk band from Bristol. The band has been born out of Heg Brignall's story-inspired songwriting and create original music, rooted in folk tradition. The band received critical acclaim for their debut album 'Raising The Fires', with national press, radio and awards for their work. They have performed across the country on headline tours and festivals and have received funding from EFDSS (English Folk Dance and Song Society) for the development of their second album. 

The early part of 2018 was spent working in collaboration with Bristol-based company Cirque Bijou on the one-off spectacle circus performance Portolan, which was performed at Sunderland's Tall Ships Races in July. Two high wire walkers (Chris Bullzini and Johanne Humbert) crossed a 200 metre long, 30 metre high wire across the River Wear to an original, purpose written soundtrack by Heg. The music was also accompanied by a 50-strong local community choir. 

The aim of this campaign is to raise enough funds to create a studio recording of the music which was written about and for the city of Sunderland. Creating a CD of the soundtrack would offer a memento of the show. 

Heg's parents and extended family are all from Seaham, very close to Sunderland, and so this project and this music has been created with deep connection to the area. It would be wonderful way to celebrate the city and it's stories.

What We Need & What You Get

To make the EP a reality, we need to raise a minimum of £3000. This will cover:

  • studio hire
  • musicians fees
  • engineers and mixing time
  • mastering
  • CD duplication 

If we go over our target, we will be able to pay for some extra publicity for the CD. 

The campaign is for pre-orders of the CD, so your contribution will get you a copy of the CD, delivered to your door.

If we don't reach our goal, we will do one of the following:

  • If the amount is too low to be able to go forward, we will refund your money in full
  • If we make close to our target, we will go forward with the recording and cut some corners in order to keep costs down, for example, aim to record it in less time than is ideal. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't afford to pre-order the CD but would like to help us, you can do so by spreading the word on social media and telling your friends and family! In particular, we'd love to get word out to anyone who saw the live show.

story:
S.AF.E Virtual Music Festival May 7th-10th

Sober AF Entertainment wants to give the masses things to do when you are stuck at home! A FREE Virtual Music Festival called S.AF.E which stands for Sober AF Entertainment but coincidently works out in another way cause we all want to “Stay Safe” from this pandemic ravaging the world. I truly wish I could fund the whole virtual event so no one has to spend money because I want to give the world a gift during these hard times, but I can’t do it alone. Help us put on the first free successful virtual music festival.

We want to take live-streaming and put it together in a music festival format. All the artists in one place.

In Italy, people are playing music off their balconies and they have caught a lot of attention around the world. We were working on this virtual music festival before the people in Italy started playing off their balconies. Thanks to them, it helped solidify our decision to move forward with the S.AF.E virtual music festival. At night, I can barely sleep due to the fact that I am very excited about this opportunity and thinking of new ideas every day and night. During the event, we will be having competitions such as best meme creations, best photo caption, funny video contests, best tips of things to do when you are stuck at home, selfie contests, and share a photo contest. Also, we are going to have an award show at the end of the event not only announcing the most liked performed artist but also for the raffle, contest winners and a sweepstake winner. 

Before the major event, we are planning to have multiple free virtual events leading up to the S.AF.E Virtual Music Festival. Sober AF Entertainment will be streaming on our website and across multiple platforms all at once so no one can miss it! You will be able to discover new artists you will fall in love with and see artists you are already in love with! Get excited about this because we are! Spread the word and get the world involved. We are alone at home, but let’s come together as a virtual community.

Artists will be live streaming, for FREE, from our site SoberAFE.com, Facebook, Instagram, Youtube and more. We want to live stream events before the festival to keep everyone entertained. We truly desire to give something people to watch and be entertained while everything is happening. This event will have interactive chat and video rooms during virtual events. There will also be links to other in place virtual experiences such as virtual museum tours. Also, we will have virtual competitions:

  • Best meme creations
  • Best photo captions
  • Funny video contests
  • Best tips of things to do when you are stuck at home
  • Selfie contests
  • Share a photo contest
  • and more!

**Free Sweepstakes Entry for a Full Epic pass 2020-2021 ($1000 value), just subscribe on our site. More sweepstake items as sponsors sign on.**

We will be extremely responsive and helpful to answer any questions you might have. We are here for you!

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Total Amount: $1,065,200
    • Artist Contributions
    • Prizes
    • Software to Stream Across Multiple Platforms
    • Subscribe to Sponsorship Websites to match with sponsors
    • Interactive Video/Chatroom Platforms
    • Marketing
      • Promotional Graphics & Videos
    • Google AdWords Campaigns
    • Social Marketing Ad Campaigns
      • Facebook
      • Google AdWords
      • YouTube
      • Snapchat
      • LinkedIn
      • Google+
         
    • There is an option to add a VR to our Virtual Music Festival if we reach $250k-$500k extra than total the stated current amount.
  • Our perks include raffle prizes which are:
    • 20 Echo Dots (3rd Gen)
    • 8 Echo Show 8's 
    • 10 Echos (3rd Gen)
    • 16 Airpod Pros
    • 8 Apple Watches Series 5
    • 2 of the Newest Smartphones (iPhone, Galaxy)
    • 2 iPad Pros
    • 1 16" Mac Book Pro
    • 2 Music Festival VIP Passes
    • 4 Festival Passes with 4 Travel Tickets
    • A Trip Around the World
    • A Chance to Speak with a Musical Artist

*Disclaimer: The perk you purchase is for that one prize. One perk purchase is not an entry for all the prizes. You are welcome to purchase multiple perks of the same prize or different prizes to possibly win multiple prizes. 

  • If we don't reach our entire goal the funds will as many live stream events as possible for the event. We are using Flexible Funding with Indiegogo to get the money for the virtual music festival. 

 

**If we don't reach $100,000 everyone will be refunded.**

 

The Impact

Everything in the world is going haywire! Artists and Festivals all over are canceling or postponing due to the novel Coronavirus. What is there to do? Sit at home and watch old videos? Read the same worrisome stories about what is going on around the world? Since artists and festivals have had to cancel or postpone their events. We are very disappointed we can't go to a concert and see our favorite artists. What if you didn't have to leave home to experience a concert to see and hear your favorite artists? Right now, Sober AF Entertainment sees an opportunity to support the US and the World to give them something to do and compete in fun competitions around the world while being constantly entertained. From our research, it seems like no one in the world has been able to pull off a massive Virtual Music Festival with entertaining things to do during the event, successfully. Help Sober AF Entertainment bring support to the world during these worrisome times!

Risks & Challenges

  • Hurdles
    • Funding
  • Solutions
    • Crowdfunding
    • Sponsorships
    • Investments

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word! Share, Post, Tweet, and Live Stream about our FREE Virtual Music Festival! Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Our Privacy Policy
Our Raffle Terms & Conditions
SAFE Music Festival Site

Visit our site to learn more about our Nonprofit Sober AF Entertainment.

Contact Info: Info@SafeMusicFestival.com

And that's all there is to it.

story:
My name is Tabitha and there is a band in my community, Church Girls, that is being legally threatened and may lose their name. That can not happen!

It's hard enough to create something from nothing but to have it ripped away would be almost criminal. A name is as defining as a fingerprint and in 4 short years, Church Girls has worked relentlessly to shape that identity. 

The goal I have set is 5,000 dollars. Any and all contributions go straight to the band for their legal fees. So whether you donate 5 dollars or 500, it all helps. Another way to contribute is simply sharing this campaign with others.

story:
Who We Are

Skata Vibration is an eclectic Afro-psychedelic band from Lagos, Nigeria. Our band is a reflection of the depth of brotherhood, depth, art, commitment and passion that the spirit which is music brings. The band has Adey (drums), Jad (lead guitar), Laughter (bass) and Stiques (vocals).

Our music is a blend of ancient northern Nigerian music, funk, grunge, jazz and rock in a twist we like to call Afro-psychedelic rock.

What We Need & What You Get

We would require funding to cover flights, accommodation and basic logistics.

  • Flights; from Lagos to London, from London back to Lagos.
  • Accommodation in a hostel close to the event venue.
  • Rehearsal studio and feeding.

We are accepting funding in exchange for limited physical signed copies of our first album, free tickets to see us perform at the biggest Afrobeats festival in the world "FELABRATION", in October, 2018.

The Impact

This opportunity will offer us a chance to showcase our kind of music. Currently in Nigeria, the Afro-pop genre has the entire mainstream and has made things difficult for a unique band to succeed. Being able to showcase ourselves outside Nigeria gives us leverage; for booking gigs internally, to be able to perform more in Nigeria and expand our fan base. Also, to be able to create a new path for musicians with a stronger message to believe that they do not have to change their uniqueness to fit in!

How Much Is On The Line?

Honestly, we have everything on the line for this opportunity! We organized a fundraiser concert, sent out emails, sold some personal valuables and have been beyond humble seeking funds in every way we can.

Partly, we feel like if we are unable to showcase, we might come up short; as people without enough drive to scale beyond our limitations. On the other hand, the entire process of seeking for resources have deepened our bond and given us a deeper sense of togetherness that is good for us as a band.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share our campaign.
  • Follow our journey.
  • Listen to our music.
  • Buy our music.
  • Attend our concerts.

story:
Short Summary

State of the Nation is a different kind of music project. The main goal is to raise people's awareness regarding what is really going on in the world by creating music and videos that tackle major world issues head on but done with a sense of fun! 

The debut album entitled 'What about the truth?' contains 12 tracks of dynamic, funky, soulful dance music that aims to inspire the listener to question the current status quo and think critically about the issues being addressed. The project is headed up by The Advocate who has over 25 years experience as a professional musician with the release of 2 albums and over 20 singles including 'The Law of One' by Disclosure. He as also written music for film and television. Vocals for the track are headed up by Kay Elizabeth who also writes and performs lead vocals for The Fontanas. Other guests are forthcoming including some superstars!

The campaign video is a bit different from your regular type as it represents the story for the music video of the first release 'LoveShots'. The idea is to take this story and make a graphic animation to bring it to life! The images in the video are just reference points to support the story so don't worry about it! :) We want to make the best video possible so your help is greatly appreciated!

What We Need & What You Get

We need $25k to properly record, produce, launch and promote the album which includes:

  • 4 Music videos (for the singles)
  • Advertising and promotion
  • Studio time
  • Mastering
  • Launch Party
And what you get is all of this:
$10 digital download of album and HD artwork with a personal thank you in the liner notes. 
$25 CD and digital download of album including HD avi's of all the videos released. Also, a personal thank you in the liner notes of the CD and digital artwork. 
$50 Exclusive T-shirt, with 'State of the Nation' original artwork or LoveShots 'Wake me up!' Artwork, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.
$60 Exclusive sweatshirt or hoodie with 'State of the Nation' original artwork or LoveShots 'Wake me up!' Artwork, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notesCD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.
$100 Two VIP tickets to the album launch party with exclusive T-shirt, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes. 
$250 A guest cameo appearance in a promotional music video to be aired on international music network channels, 2xVIP tickets to the album launch party with exclusive T-shirt, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.
$500 Exclusive digital copies of 'The Law of One' and 2 other tracks including music video's by Disclosure. A guest cameo appearance in a promotional music video to be aired on international music network channels, 2xVIP tickets to the album launch party with exclusive T-shirt, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.
$1000 A guest appearance on the album. This includes you performing on a track of your choice with your vocal or instrument talents!. Also, exclusive digital copies of 'The Law of One' and 10 other tracks including music video's by Disclosure. A guest cameo appearance in a promotional music video to be aired on international music network channels, 2xVIP tickets to the album launch party with exclusive sweatshirt or hoodie, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.
The Impact

State of the Nation is all about truth. By taking part in this project you are helping to raise people's understanding and awareness regarding some very serious world issues that are addressed in the music and videos. Our hope is that this will in turn raise the consciousness of more and more people to support the cause and get the truth out!

We believe this is valuable to you and the world for the following reasons:

  • You will help to make an impact in combatting all the garbage that is being fed to the world in the mainstream media.
  • You will get your own personal message across. 
  • You will be part of an exciting project that aims to change the world for the better.
  • You will have a lot of fun contributing to the project by helping to create some of the most innovative music and leading edge videos for global release!

Risks & Challenges

We understand that taking on a project like this can be a little challenging as it is sometimes tough for people to see through the sophistry and believe the truth, but we live in hope that there are enough of you out there who want to help your fellow man and woman to see through deception and find out what is really going on!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • If you believe in this campaign then you can really help by making some noise and telling your friends about it.
  • You can  also share by using the Indiegogo share tools! Please help to make this project a success!

Thank you very much!
story_txt:
Short Summary State of the Nation is a different kind of music project. The main goal is to raise people's awareness regarding what is really going on in the world by creating music and videos that tackle major world issues head on but done with a sense of fun! 
The debut album entitled 'What about the truth?' contains 12 tracks of dynamic, funky, soulful dance music that aims to inspire the listener to question the current status quo and think critically about the issues being addressed. The project is headed up by The Advocate who has over 25 years experience as a professional musician with the release of 2 albums and over 20 singles including 'The Law of One' by Disclosure. He as also written music for film and television. Vocals for the track are headed up by Kay Elizabeth who also writes and performs lead vocals for The Fontanas. Other guests are forthcoming including some superstars!
The campaign video is a bit different from your regular type as it represents the story for the music video of the first release 'LoveShots'. The idea is to take this story and make a graphic animation to bring it to life! The images in the video are just reference points to support the story so don't worry about it! :) We want to make the best video possible so your help is greatly appreciated!   What We Need & What You Get We need $25k to properly record, produce, launch and promote the album which includes:  4 Music videos (for the singles) Advertising and promotion Studio time
Mastering
Launch Party
And what you get is all of this:  $10 digital download of album and HD artwork with a personal thank you in the liner notes. $25 CD and digital download of album including HD avi's of all the videos released. Also, a personal thank you in the liner notes of the CD and digital artwork. $50 Exclusive T-shirt, with 'State of the Nation' original artwork or LoveShots 'Wake me up!' Artwork, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.$60 Exclusive sweatshirt or hoodie with 'State of the Nation' original artwork  or LoveShots 'Wake me up!' Artwork, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notesCD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.$100 Two VIP tickets to the album launch party with exclusive T-shirt, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes. $250 A guest cameo appearance in a promotional music video to be aired on international music network channels, 2xVIP tickets to the album launch party with exclusive T-shirt, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.$500 Exclusive digital copies of 'The Law of One' and 2 other tracks including music video's by Disclosure.  A guest cameo appearance in a promotional music video to be aired on international music network channels, 2xVIP tickets to the album launch party with exclusive T-shirt, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.$1000 A guest appearance on the album. This includes you performing on a track of your choice with your vocal or instrument talents!. Also, exclusive digital copies of 'The Law of One' and 10 other tracks including music video's by Disclosure.  A guest cameo appearance in a promotional music video to be aired on international music network channels, 2xVIP tickets to the album launch party with exclusive sweatshirt or hoodie, CD, digital download, videos, personal thank you in the liner notes.
The Impact
 State of the Nation is all about truth. By taking part in this project you are helping to raise people's understanding and awareness regarding some very serious world issues that are addressed in the music and videos. Our hope is that this will in turn raise the consciousness of more and more people to support the cause and get the truth out!
We believe this is valuable to you and the world for the following reasons:  You will help to make an impact in combatting all the garbage that is being fed to the world in the mainstream media.
You will get your own personal message across.  You will be part of an exciting project that aims to change the world for the better. You will have a lot of fun contributing to the project by helping to create some of the most innovative music and leading edge videos for global release!    Risks & Challenges We understand that taking on a project like this can be a little challenging as it is sometimes tough for people to see through the sophistry and believe the truth, but we live in hope that there are enough of you out there who want to help your fellow man and woman to see through deception and find out what is really going on!
    Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  If you believe in this campaign then you can really help by making some noise and telling your friends about it. You can  also share by using the Indiegogo share tools! Please help to make this project a success!   Thank you very much!

story:
Short Summary

Independent singer/songwriter, Honey in the Rock is from the Philippines, committed to writing music inspired by the Scriptures. 
‘Man does not live on bread alone, but on every word that comes from the mouth of YHWH.'(Our Creator in Hebrew)

Starting out in 2007, she began her journey creating inspirational songs, without the support of any record label, with the desire to help people see the beauty of life. Not exempted from personal trials and tragedies herself, she chooses to rise up and challenge herself to reach out to others by converting her own misfortunes into powerful songs with the purpose of helping others to see light despite heavy circumstances that they may be going through. "In your desperation, arise and breathe, your life is precious" became her motivation to herself, choosing to see others in the world with greater needs.

A true-blooded artist-missionary, she had seen people suffer in different parts of her country and in the world as well, thus she maintains her focus on others and see life's purpose.

As a seasoned artist, with years of experience in advertising and production background, she was able to build up her You tube channel using all her training from concept to final production for each song, and since then, have reached quite a number of people from different parts of the globe, thanks to free streaming via the internet.

To date, she plans to produce an EP album containing 3 new songs, that explains the reason for this campaign. The songs will carry themes relevant to what's happening in the present time we're in. While writing the songs come easy, the production cost to deliver the finished product isn't cheap. There are costs involved starting from musical arrangements, recording, and mixing in a recording studio. Fortunately, we can all join hands to make this possible. 

Honey in the Rock invites everyone to be part of this and help out, so that she may be able to continually create music that will inspire all of us. Our corporate actions will be our way of bringing inspiration and light in peoples' lives as we daily see hopelessness and despair happening in this present world.

Love your neighbor as yourself. Make music as an avenue to help build them up and  especially to love the Creator, Almighty YAH for His wonderful purposes.

Here are some of Honey in the Rock's best loved songs




Where the money will go

The money that will be gathered through this campaign project will be sent to Honey in the Rock who is currently in the Philippines writing great music for us. Once she receives it, she can start the new songs, and allocate the money for the following:

- Musical arrangements

- Musicians' rehearsals

- Recording, editing & mixing in a professional studio

- Mastering 

If the funding exceeds target goal, then allotment can be done for the following :

- Lyric video for the songs

- Promotions via digital

- Possibly an event to launch the new songs 

No contribution is too small to make this happen, together, we can be part of sending this beautiful message via music to precious souls needing TRUE LOVE and  the Perfect SHALOM (Peace) to this great needy world we live in.

Her other existing songs can be found in the YouTube channel contained in the link below. 

https://www.youtube.com/user/Rocklight2012/videos

Risks & Challenges

There are always risk and challenges in music production but Honey in the Rock has been doing this for years now. You may give her your full confidence and trust that she will be able to make this project come to life with your help. She's been able to bring her songs to us being an independent artist. We're sure she will be able to do it again at a greater scale.

Other Ways You Can Help

1. Spread and pass the word about this crowdfunding campaign. Share it with your contacts through social media. It's free. The more people who knows about this, the better. 

2. Contribute to this IndieGoGo crowdfunding project.

3. Purchase your Tshirts personally designed by Honey in the Rock from this links -

For those outside US - https://www.teezily.com/stores/truth-shirts

For  those in the US   -  http://teespring.com/stores/truthshirts#

Proceeds of the Tshirt sales will further help fund the musical project and stretch goals to enable Honey in the Rock to produce more songs.

story:
The emancipation of innovative galilean sound.....

Hi there awesome people! My name is Chaim Malespin 

I was born in Oregon in the US, we are  a family of six musical kids. We were raised singing harmonies together as a family every day, and eventually we developed skill in a variety  of instruments. I play the electric guitar, rhythm guitar, banjo, harmonica, percussion etc. We immigrated to Israel when I was 15, and that changed my musical style  bringing forth a new richness. Many of you have followed me as I have performed everywhere from old folks homes, to bars, to big stages, and now it is time record!

It is timely and necessary to launch this campaign, because we believe that my songs need to be recorded to inspire the next generation to follow their dreams. 

 As a father of two with a full-time job, this would not be possible without your help! Any amount will help, please click the button below to  support my campaign right now!

Studio time is expensive but I have already located a studio and a top producer, who has recorded many successful musicians here, He will also give me the most competitive rates, according to my analysis. 

My songs are already written, and the best one has been selected for the EP recording, and the video clip, the story board is ready.

I NEED YOUR HELP! Everything i do, i do to excellence, but, whew, that that costs money.
I need $5,000 for the producer, the studio, the musicians, the actors, the food, the videography, editing, travel and marketing.

Please donate whatever you can. I’m
grateful for anything (I cant wait to send you some perks!-listed below). If you can’t help with a
donation, you can still help by sharing this with your friends! Lets go inspire!

Thank you for helping to make this dream a reality, thanks to all those who have supported, donated, and believed in me.

Chaim Japheth Malespin

story:
Short Summary

Sharebunk is the world's first social networking messenger that streams non-stop music you can rate and also gives you access to local online radio channels. It doesn't matter if you're a music junkie, a social media ninja or a chat sensei, Sharebunk has got something for you;

• Video, Picture and sticker sharing on your timeline

• Timeline connects all users and allows comments, likes and invites.

• Share posts on other social media platforms

• Chat and make Calls, without airtime

• multimedia and file sharing

• local online radio channels

• Pause and Play non-stop music

• Rate Artists and decide which song stays or leaves

• and lots more fun stuff... :)

Sharebunk was conceived as a platform that allows friends and family across the world to connect while they enjoy great new music and also stay informed on happenings around their locality. We've designed the music streaming with the aim of letting, music lovers and emerging artists with great songs, discover new music and get their songs heard, respectively.

This project is lead by Strictlyui.com Co-Founder, Dare Odumade.

Our mission is to provide a constant entertaining and informative platform, for connecting friends and family to share and enjoy life’s moments


What We Need & What You Get

Sharebunk app is currently in development on Android and iPhone platforms, funding will be used to complete development, then for marketing and promotion of the app.

There are a lot of exciting first user perks for you, if you contribute to this awesome project. So, kindly check them out!


The Impact

Sharebunk is important because it will;

• Allow people of different backgrounds and culture to interact and connect

• Allow exchange of ideas and dialogue

• Allow emerging artists with great talent across the world, to be heard and encouraged

• Allow New music discovery

• Allows Artists to get instant feedback on their songs from listeners, what ordinary radio stations cannot do.

We'll simply make sure you never get bored while networking.


Risks & Challenges

So far our major challenge has been finance. However, during the early stage of development we had technical difficulties on how to design backend technology that merges the required servers but after several brain storming sessions our dynamic team of developers found a way through and now manage all the functions of the app on one control panel. Gathering songs from emerging artists also, took some sweat off our jaws, but we have gathered a good number of songs and also have song release agreements with bodies that promotes new artists.

We have over come several challenges from technical, to team, marketing, promotion etc. and hope that your contribution will help us surpass all future challenges.


Support us and help make Sharebunk happen!
