story:
Short Summary

I have been playing the Ukulele for over 10 years! I went to school for music and taught band and orchestra for 10 years. I love Video Games, Anime, Sci-fi and anything geeky! And I love to create, arrange my music and direct my music videos! Which is where I need your help! I have been funding (along with the amazing time of some amazingly creative people) my music videos for my YouTube channel for the last year. In a year we have been able to create 6 fully conceptualized music videos! And I want to get a few more out before the end of the year, and that is where I need your help!

What We Need & What You Get

In order to do this we need a little help getting them done, The money made to create these will go towards, Better instrumental recording for the tracks, Money to be able to use better locations (so far I have relied on the resources around me, but there are two videos coming up that I want to use areas that are not free to use.), as well as other aspects that I cannot do out of pocket. 

  • Each video I do takes about $200 out of pocket expenses from me, having a slightly larger budget means we can go all out on them!
  • The perks are low on this one since they are thank you's at the end of the videos and an EP download of the Ukulele pieces I have recorded so far (along with the newest videos track as well!) 
  • All funds made in this will go to create the next three videos (October Video, Original Piece that is being written for me, Harry Potter theme and/or Game of Thrones theme (I want to use the same location, so both may happen), and Holiday video. So technically four videos, but the Holiday video doesn't take much money to do) If it is not all used on that it will also go towards the videos after that, anything made in this will go straight to other videos. 

The Impact

 The geek music scene is strong, and I love making music and playing concerts. Being able to show that the Ukulele can have the same response as the Violin or other string instruments and not just be the "toy instrument" is important to me and everyone out there who plays it! Also getting to listen to your favorite geeky tunes in a new form is always really fun as well!

Risks & Challenges

Risks of this project not being completely funded? Just means that it will take longer for each video to come out. So far I have two confirmed videos for the remainder of the year that will be made no matter what. I would love to be able to film the other two this year and get them out early next year, but if we don't make the funding then they will be filmed next year. 

If I end up making more? then the money will go into producing the videos after the ones on this list! So any money made on this Indiegogo (and my Patreon) goes straight into making the music videos for my YouTube Channel bigger and better! 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Subscribe to my Youtube channel! 
  • Share my videos!
  • Check out my Patreon if you want to help me out regularly!
  • Share this Indiegogo and help us make out goal!

story:
Hello there Devils, and thank you for taking the time to consider helping us with what will be our most ambitious and rewarding project yet! We know you’re busy, so let’s get straight to who we are, and what we do.

 

About Us

 

We’re a five piece, female fronted ‘character metal’ band. What’s that you say? In a nutshell, we choose a popular character and create a song from the ground up to musically, lyrically, and vocally fit their personality and tell their story. Our vocalist, Evilyn, writes the songs and then, as a band, we breathe life into them to make them a reality.

 

About Our Music

 

The style of music is tailored to suit the character, and the vocal performance is designed to impersonate/act out that character. One example is our song, I Bathe in Blood, which is an ode to the 16th Century Hungarian serial killer, Countess Elizabeth Bathory. This song has a distinctly Baroque/Renaissance musical feel to it to fit the era in which Bathory lived, and is sung entirely with a Hungarian accent to capture who she was.

 

About The Vision

Our most recent metal homage is to the cult horror movie, Jennifer's Body. The song itself is recorded and ready for your ears, but, in typical Halo fashion, we want to go all out for it! We want to produce a full on, boy eating, bloody, goretastically brutal music video to do this justice, and to make sure this song travels as far and wide as it possibly can. We want to show the world our very own brand of metal; character metal and just how awesome it can be. For this to happen, WE NEED YOU TO CHEER US ON!

About The Video

This cinematic style production will be produced and directed by Neon Temple who have an 18 year history of creating music videos and TV commercials for many well recognised names. All sequences shot will be with a full professional crew in a studio and sound stage and as well as all the usual trappings of a feature style production such as this there will also be award winning prosthetic and creature effects artists who will be providing all the lovely bloody stuff! In post it will be edited and colour graded in the style of the original American film of which the theme of the track is based on.

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is £3,500 to maximise the potential of our production; the more we receive, the more we can do! We have a lot of ideas for this video and we want to be able to execute them all!

Of course, our Devils (YOU) are as much a part of this as we are and we want everyone to get something out of it along the way! A few perks you can achieve from the funding of this campaign are:

- Instant access to the music video's track 'Fearleader'

- Instant access to an instrumental piano version of Diabolus

- Crowdfund exclusive merchandise to let the world know you were involved in the making of world domination later! 

- Exclusive art designed by our very own Evilyn!

- Personalised thank you from the band so we can let you know exactly how much you mean to us as the Devil BFFs (Best Freakin' Fans!)

- A chance to be ON SET with us as we produce the music video as well as TAKE PART IN THE MUSIC VIDEO! 

- One very lucky fan gets to choose the next character to be immortalised in song!

The list for perks and prizes goes on and on! 

All the money funded will go straight to the production of the video. As said before; the more we get, the more we can do! 

The Impact

Your favourite band doesn't create music and art to fuel their own happiness, they do it for their fans and for the love of music; we're no different. You Devils are the reason we do what we do individually and together. Your contribution to this campaign makes it possible for us to build upon a community of music fans, so throw your horns up and show pride in what you love!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand more than anyone that this is asking a lot of you and you may not have the financial freedom to back what you love. However, our end-goal is to build a foundation of fans who can relate to each other through the power and love of Music, TV and Film. You can help us in achieving this goal by sharing the campaign with your friends and making some noise about the campaign. This action can be achieved with one click of a share tool across multiple social media sites. All we can reward you with is a guaranteed continued passion for making music and art, as well as our sincere thanks, but, if you want more...you know what you have to do! 

LET'S GO DEVILS!

About Us
 
We’re a five piece, female fronted ‘character metal’ band. What’s that you say? In a nutshell, we choose a popular character and create a song from the ground up to musically, lyrically, and vocally fit their personality and tell their story. Our vocalist, Evilyn, writes the songs and then, as a band, we breathe life into them to make them a reality.
 
About Our Music
 
The style of music is tailored to suit the character, and the vocal performance is designed to impersonate/act out that character. One example is our song, I Bathe in Blood, which is an ode to the 16th Century Hungarian serial killer, Countess Elizabeth Bathory. This song has a distinctly Baroque/Renaissance musical feel to it to fit the era in which Bathory lived, and is sung entirely with a Hungarian accent to capture who she was.
 
About The Vision
Our most recent metal homage is to the cult horror movie, Jennifer's Body. The song itself is recorded and ready for your ears, but, in typical Halo fashion, we want to go all out for it! We want to produce a full on, boy eating, bloody, goretastically brutal music video to do this justice, and to make sure this song travels as far and wide as it possibly can. We want to show the world our very own brand of metal; character metal and just how awesome it can be. For this to happen, WE NEED YOU TO CHEER US ON!
About The Video
This cinematic style production will be produced and directed by Neon Temple who have an 18 year history of creating music videos and TV commercials for many well recognised names. All sequences shot will be with a full professional crew in a studio and sound stage and as well as all the usual trappings of a feature style production such as this there will also be award winning prosthetic and creature effects artists who will be providing all the lovely bloody stuff! In post it will be edited and colour graded in the style of the original American film of which the theme of the track is based on.
What We Need & What You Get
Our goal is £3,500 to maximise the potential of our production; the more we receive, the more we can do! We have a lot of ideas for this video and we want to be able to execute them all!
Of course, our Devils (YOU) are as much a part of this as we are and we want everyone to get something out of it along the way! A few perks you can achieve from the funding of this campaign are:
- Instant access to the music video's track 'Fearleader'
- Instant access to an instrumental piano version of Diabolus
- Crowdfund exclusive merchandise to let the world know you were involved in the making of world domination later! 
- Exclusive art designed by our very own Evilyn!
- Personalised thank you from the band so we can let you know exactly how much you mean to us as the Devil BFFs (Best Freakin' Fans!)
- A chance to be ON SET with us as we produce the music video as well as TAKE PART IN THE MUSIC VIDEO! 
- One very lucky fan gets to choose the next character to be immortalised in song!
The list for perks and prizes goes on and on! 
All the money funded will go straight to the production of the video. As said before; the more we get, the more we can do! 
The Impact
Your favourite band doesn't create music and art to fuel their own happiness, they do it for their fans and for the love of music; we're no different. You Devils are the reason we do what we do individually and together. Your contribution to this campaign makes it possible for us to build upon a community of music fans, so throw your horns up and show pride in what you love!
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand more than anyone that this is asking a lot of you and you may not have the financial freedom to back what you love. However, our end-goal is to build a foundation of fans who can relate to each other through the power and love of Music, TV and Film. You can help us in achieving this goal by sharing the campaign with your friends and making some noise about the campaign. This action can be achieved with one click of a share tool across multiple social media sites. All we can reward you with is a guaranteed continued passion for making music and art, as well as our sincere thanks, but, if you want more...you know what you have to do! LET'S GO DEVILS!

story:
I made you this video to share with you this low budget adventure and talk about the objectives of my campaign:

 

 

 Im a Portuguese/German Singer-Songwriter and Filmmaker who studied Philosophy in Berlin and Medicine in South America and the Netherlands.

Nowadays I am fully dedicated to crafting my art. Everything you hear or see of my art is self taught: the instruments, the music production, Film directing, editing, the paintings etc.

I never thought I’d follow a career in something I never learnt in an academic institution (I come from an academic family). But on the other hand that makes it more interesting for me…  

I started traveling the world by myself at the age of 17 and have been writing songs and producing since then: In 2013 I worked for a year with an Italian NGO in a prison in Mozambique as a guitar teacher. In 2016 I traveled through South America during my medical studies. My computer is full of scripts and compositions carefully worked on throughout these years, burning to get produced and be shared with you.

 

 

I don’t have a label or any company financing me. I worked in the Netherlands as a cook (no idea how I got that job) and as a delivery man (common student job there), to be able to finance my first production.  

In short: You are my record label. I want to explore the world with a camera and my instruments, capturing details, asking the world questions and transform its answers into art - together with your will and support.

Im looking forward to meeting some of you, learn from you and from your culture, whatever part from the world you’re from.

 

 

I will invest 10k in the Album Production. The other part of the money I will use for at least one well produced music film.

Shouldn't I attain the first goal I will use it for the productions of singles instead of a full album. Should the money exceed my first goal I will be able to buy a good camera. This would help me a lot, reduce production costs and allow me to film whenever and wherever I am, resulting in something... Imagine, riding an old rusty bus in Argentina roaming through the cold green mountains covered in clouds with a beautiful red sunset in the back. If I was able to capture this moment with a personal camera and mixing this later on with other material. Think of what the end result could look like...

The first cave painter certainly didn't think of how to make profit from his paintings. I wish to do the same. Just make Art from the heart not trying to coincide with industry standards. But still be able to make a living and sharing my art with you.

Are you interested in this journey? Every support is very much appreciated.

Should you not be able to financially support this campaign, share it with your friends and family that also helps a lot.

 

 

Obrigado! Danke! Gracias! Merci! Kanimambo!

story:
Dear Friends,

There are few things in life that can uplift someone’s day like a great song. We’ve all been in a position where maybe we were having a bad day…or we were in an argument…

And that one song came on the radio and changed everything!

Trance Fury is a life-long recording artist who’s recorded hit Trance music since 1998. His most recent album, North American Oscillation is set to send a shockwave through the music industry.

Trance Fury recorded his most recent album…North American Oscillation in between a full time job and raising a son with Autism! 

This album will not only change music, it will help people throughout their day. We all know that many people aren’t getting enough positivity in their day-to-day lives. Trance music helps people develop a positive attitude, and leave their day behind.

Helping us release this new Album will help bring joy into many people’s lives, including your own. Please, give the gift of music!

Here Are The Realities Of Being A Trance DJ

Allow me connect some dots for you…

The life of a Trance DJ is a very tough one. It feels like almost everyone you know has recently decided to become a DJ. DJ’s must be mentally durable and literally “start from the bottom” and work their way to the top.

Trance Fury has had a measured level of success in the toughest industry in the world, the music industry.

Here Are A Few Of Trance Fury’s Achievements:

  • 4 million spins on Pandora radio and counting
  • #1 on ReverbNation Charts
  • Songs played on the Weather Channel
  • Featured on Roxy in LA
  • College Radio Station Top 10 Charts for Mother Earth & Father Time
  • Artist since 1998!

And many more!

About the Album - North American Oscillation

Trance Fury is working closely with Grammy Award Winning Engineer Mikael Eldridge aka "Count" who has also mixed and mastered Tycho's past couple of albums. The album is centered around Physics, Weather, and life challenges, i.e. North American Oscillation.

More About Trance Fury

Trance Fury was born in Kingston, NY and now resides in Raleigh, NC with his wife of 20 years and his 9 year old son.

Trance Fury and his wife of 20 years are both working full time jobs and raise a young son diagnosed with ASD. Writing this album is not only a piece of art, it’s a tribute to all those who go above and beyond life’s everyday struggles.  

Select Contribution Levels Can Shape the Album

Select contributors to this campaign will be chosen to contribute to the North American Oscillation album!

After you’ve donated, we’ll reach to you to help influence a real album. You’ll be given the opportunity to select perks which allow you to select from specific mixes, or even a song title…and see which one you want on this album!

Anyone who contributes to the album deserves to have a little say in what the final product is. We appreciate your contribution so much; we want you to become a part of our operation.

A Once In A Lifetime Opportunity

Living in 2018, it’s very hard to imagine life without the internet. We can now get what we want, when we want at anytime! For the first time ever, it’s possible to fund projects just like this one….completely wirelessly.

Let me paint you a picture….

Before the internet and crowd funding platforms like this, becoming a successful artist was next to impossible. You had to be “connected” with a lot of suits in order to make it in the music industry.

Without these powerful connections, getting heard in such a crowded field wouldn’t even be possible.

When you select a perk from this campaign, not only are you supporting art, you’re supporting the future. Online campaigns like this one are the future of entertainment!

We look forward to your perk selections!

Until Next Time,

The Trance Fury Team

For more information on Trace Fury and his most recent album North American Oscillation…you can read his full length Wikipedia page here. To receive real time updates from Trance Fury follow him on Twitter @TranceFury

story:
Hi, my name is Stephanie DeGraw and my passion is promoting musicians. 

Please assist us raise money so the band can get back to performing shows. They are by far the best Pantera tribute band around. And they are really great guys.

All monies raised will go to replace their equipment and instruments, directly to the band.

This happened out of the blue so any donation is very appreciated. 

Please share this campaign. Click on the Indiegogo Share Tools.  Thank You.

story:
(Русский язык ниже и так же в моем Инстаграм)
(Portugues esto em baixo e em eu instagram)
 

Hi everyone! I am Alice Killer, im Russian but almost two years ago I quit my career, sold all my stuff and got out of my country with one backpack, guitar and studio gear to explore Latin America and finally do what I am meant to - sing, compose, produce music and videos.

In these two years I was learning a lot about Latin music, its rhythm and the vibes and was trying to find the right people to make my own music with.

You never know where life brings you, especially if you are the fearless dreamer as I am.
So life brought me this amazing talented producer and dj from California , the bass player of The Gitas - Sal Ramazzini. 
We felt this amazing connection and created the idea of our music project - which includes latin, electronic, techno, rock and Folk vibes.
Because of the locdown we couldn’t meet, so we started to work on the EP online. But now we finally can fly and make our idea come true!

We wanna produce our first EP here in Brazil in state of Ceara, with local musicians, in a local studio.

There is a possibility for us to meet in less then two weeks which is insanely short time (I know)
And so all this will be impossible without your help.

We need money to transfer Sal to Brazil.
Rent a studio, pay musicians and mixing the records.

We need this myrical of crowd founding,  we need your support and  I truly believe with all my heart if it is meant to be we can do it together.

So the expenses are:
1000$ - for producer
1000$ - for studio and musicians
1000$ - for mixing and mastering
 

 if we don't reach our entire goal - depending on amount of it, money will help in the same idea (we also searching for sponsors offline) or help with recording later. 
Also if accidentally we get more than we ask for, money will go to help us distribute our EP and make videos too.

A little information about me

I am an artist and composer, singer, director, script writer and creator.
In the video above you can see the parts of videos which I directed myself with a budget of less than 200$ (for all of them) and huge help of my friends.
There also you can hear parts of my songs, which were recorded in russia, so you can understand more my vibe and ideas.
Sal Ramazzini has got his amazing DJ sets on SoundCloud - put it on your home party, enjoy, dance and imagine how amazing we can unite our energies.

you can fallow me and him on instagram @alicekiller @salramazzini
me on tictok  @alicedelicia
me in clubhouse @alicekiller where I plan to share my experience of making music, travelling the world, spiritual growth and unconditional love.

I am a dreamer and fighter.
I wanna encourage people to fearlessly live their dreams no matter what. Because I truly believe if you are following your innerself, your path -  all universe with all the beautiful souls in it, gonna help you.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share our project with your friends in social medias - some of them may like it and be willing to help. For you it's couple of clicks for me it's life changing thing!

    If you have Miles and wanna help us with Sal's ticket - please contact us in instagram or by email aliceradke@mail.ru

    you can also support my music by buying our jewelleries in instagram @lovieacessorios 
     

    I really hope you'll help me out to  realise my life goal.
    And the world finally can hear my message of love and joy.
    Sincerely yours Alice Killer
    love you


    PORTUGUESE!!!

Olá pessoal! Sou Alice Killer, sou Russa mas ja levo quase dois anos na América do sul, quando larguei minha carreira, vendi todas as minhas coisas e sai do meu país com apenas uma mochila, violão e equipamentos de estudio para explorar o mundo e finalmente fazer o que eu sempre quis- cantar, produzir música e vídeos. 

Durante estes dois anos eu aprendi sobre musica latina, seus ritmos e vibes e tentei encontrar as pessoas certas para fazer minha própria música. 

Nós nunca sabemos onde a vida nos traz, especialmente quando somos sonhadores como eu! E então a vida me trouxe esse incrível e talentoso produtor e dj da Califórnia, o baixista da The Gitas - Sal Ramazzini. 
Nós temos essa enorme e especial conexão e criamos a ideia de nosso projeto musical - que inclui latino, eletrônica, techno, rock e folk vibes. 

Por conta do lockdown nós não pudemos nos encontrar, mas finalmente poderemos voar e fazer nossa ideia e sonho se realizar 

Pretendemos poduzir nosso primeiro EP aqui no Brazil no estado do Ceará, com músicos locais, em um estúdio local. 

Ha uma possibilidade para nos encontrarmos em duas semanas, o que é um tempo muito curto, eu sei. E tudo isso seria impossível sem a ajuda de vocês. 

Nós precisamos de dinheiro para transferir Sal para o Brasil. 
Alugar um estúdio, pagar os músicos e nossos gastos modestos nestes 20 dias trabalhando no EP. 

Normalmente as pessoas aqui pedem por dinheiro para produzir e masterizar, mas felizmente podemos fazer isso nós mesmos. Então tudo que precisamos é nos encontrar e começar. 
 
Nós precisamos deste myrical os crowd founding, precisamos de seu suporte e eu acredito do fundo do meu coração que se for para acontecer, podemos fazer isso juntos! 

Os valores são: 
Producing US$ 1200,00
Mixing/ Mastering US$ 1000,00
Outros gastos US$ 800,00


РУССКИЙ

Всем Привет! Меня зовут Алиса - я певица, композитор и музыкант. Меньше, чем два года назад я уволилась с работы, продала свои вещи и отправилась путешевствовать в неизведанный мной мир Латинской Америки! Здесь, в Бразилии , я очень выросла как музыкант и как личность!

И сейчас я работаю над свои EP c продюсером, диджеем, басистом группы the Gitas - Сал Рамаззини. Из-за локдаунов мы, как и все,  начали работать над музыкой онлайн . У нас получается своеобразный микс электронной музыки (для вашей вечеринки) с рок'нроллом , самбой, босановой и прочими латинскими ритмами. 

Сейчас настал момент завершить работу, меньше чем через две недели мы можем встретиться в Бразилии, арендовать студию, нанять местных музыкантов, а после отдать записанное на мастеринг и микшеринг.

Для этого мне и нужна ваша помощь:
1000$ - продюсеру (в основном это расходы на передвижение)
1000$ - на аренду студии и оплату музыкантов
1000$ - на мастеринг в Калифорнии

Я действительно верю, что сейчас настал тот самый момент, когда все к чему я шла всю жизнь может реализоваться. И все что мне нужно - ваша помощь и поддержка!

Сверху вы можете увидеть примеры моих работ как режиссера ( не смонтированые сырые отрывки) и услышать мои композиции записанные ранее в России. Я не стала включать туда живые выступления, участия в выставке Покраса Лампаса и фестивали прошлых лет - все это вы можете найти в моем инстаграм @alicekiller

Я очень благодарна, что вы нашли время и прочитали это все до конца, за ваши помощь, поддержку! и Надеюсь, что вы поделитесь этим со своими друзьями!
Времени у нас мало, но я в нас верю!
Искренне ваша, Алиса Киллер.

Pretendemos poduzir nosso primeiro EP aqui no Brazil no estado do Ceará, com músicos locais, em um estúdio local. 
Ha uma possibilidade para nos encontrarmos em duas semanas, o que é um tempo muito curto, eu sei. E tudo isso seria impossível sem a ajuda de vocês. 
Nós precisamos de dinheiro para transferir Sal para o Brasil. Alugar um estúdio, pagar os músicos e nossos gastos modestos nestes 20 dias trabalhando no EP. 
Normalmente as pessoas aqui pedem por dinheiro para produzir e masterizar, mas felizmente podemos fazer isso nós mesmos. Então tudo que precisamos é nos encontrar e começar.  Nós precisamos deste myrical os crowd founding, precisamos de seu suporte e eu acredito do fundo do meu coração que se for para acontecer, podemos fazer isso juntos! 
Os valores são: Producing US$ 1200,00Mixing/ Mastering US$ 1000,00Outros gastos US$ 800,00РУССКИЙВсем Привет! Меня зовут Алиса - я певица, композитор и музыкант. Меньше, чем два года назад я уволилась с работы, продала свои вещи и отправилась путешевствовать в неизведанный мной мир Латинской Америки! Здесь, в Бразилии , я очень выросла как музыкант и как личность!И сейчас я работаю над свои EP c продюсером, диджеем, басистом группы the Gitas - Сал Рамаззини. Из-за локдаунов мы, как и все,  начали работать над музыкой онлайн . У нас получается своеобразный микс электронной музыки (для вашей вечеринки) с рок'нроллом , самбой, босановой и прочими латинскими ритмами. Сейчас настал момент завершить работу, меньше чем через две недели мы можем встретиться в Бразилии, арендовать студию, нанять местных музыкантов, а после отдать записанное на мастеринг и микшеринг.Для этого мне и нужна ваша помощь:1000$ - продюсеру (в основном это расходы на передвижение)1000$ - на аренду студии и оплату музыкантов1000$ - на мастеринг в КалифорнииЯ действительно верю, что сейчас настал тот самый момент, когда все к чему я шла всю жизнь может реализоваться. И все что мне нужно - ваша помощь и поддержка!Сверху вы можете увидеть примеры моих работ как режиссера ( не смонтированые сырые отрывки) и услышать мои композиции записанные ранее в России. Я не стала включать туда живые выступления, участия в выставке Покраса Лампаса и фестивали прошлых лет - все это вы можете найти в моем инстаграм @alicekillerЯ очень благодарна, что вы нашли время и прочитали это все до конца, за ваши помощь, поддержку! и Надеюсь, что вы поделитесь этим со своими друзьями!Времени у нас мало, но я в нас верю!Искренне ваша, Алиса Киллер.

story:
WHAT: Driver distraction and inattention in road traffic and the resulting accidents have become a world-wide problem. Drivers are often tempted to use their mobile phones while driving, even though all disruptive use of communication devices is forbidden in most jurisdictions.



Video from The US Department of Transportation's National Highway Traffic Safety Administration's YouTube channel

SOLUTION: How about if you could create your own personalized radio channel, where the DJ is your favorite celebrity and totally talking about your own Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn feeds, the news that you want mixed together with your favorite streaming music service? With Feed of Me it is possible. No need to check your device, while driving. Safe, secure and legal.

Login Screen

Our background in radio broadcasting helped us to innovated this service for people, who don't want to miss any information or experiences while on the move.

Feed of Me is a patent pending cloud based service, where personal social media and public news services are combined and transferred into audible content and mixed together with music services in a way that mimics traditional radio broadcast. The easy to use service is operated and programmed with your Android and iOS smart device app, that is developed by Feed of Me team.

Audio, that is fetched from social media sites, is personalized by the user with feeling, genre and person.

Market specific celebrity, politician and athlete voices will be available as In App purchase

Would be really cool to have voices that sound like Barrack Obama, Arnold Schwarzenegger or Katy Perry to read aloud your own Facebook and Twitter feeds between your favorite Spotify tracks, while commuting to work?

We are born global and fully scalable. We support over 30 languages and dialects. We use Acapela Group's TTS engine that creates authentic and original voices that express meaning and intent.

 Barrack Obama, Arnold Schwarzenegger or Katy Perry to read aloud your

My Feeds Screen
Our experienced team (click name for more info) has international broadcast media leadership and communications software development expertise. 
Founder & CEO:
Timo Uusi-Kerttula





Board Members:
Kia Aejmelaeus





 Anu Moisio

UX/UI Designer:Dinesh Kumar
Software Developers: 


Rupsha Bagchi - Lead Developer 

Satya Narayan – Senior Android Developer 
Srikanth Shankar – Senior Android Developer 
Vinod Ram – Junior Android Developer 
Kamal Kumar – Junior Android Developer 
Deepak Kanji – PHP Developer 

Our advisors are world class and highly recommended:
Tiit Paananen
 joined Skype on 2005 as a test director after 10 years in leading 
companies in Software Development and Engineering Operation roles in 
Estonia and Baltics. In Skype he was responsible for Software Quality 
Engineering and testing for 6 years. Last 2 years as a General Manager 
of Skype Estonia he coordinated also Engineering L&D, onboarding and
 community management globally for Skype. Today Tiit works as a head of 
Quality Engineering in Pipedrive which was just recently recognized with
 best employer of Estonia 2016 award.
Mikael Jungner joined
 Microsoft Corporation (Finland) in 2002 as director of information 
society relations. In 2005 he started a five-year term as Managing 
Director of Finnish National Broadcaster YLE. In 2010, Jungner was 
elected as the party secretary of The Social Democratic Party of 
Finland. In 2011 was elected to Finnish Parliament for a four-year term.
 In 2015 he was appointed to be a Managing Director of Kreab Oy, a 
communications consultancy agency.
Tuomas Enbuske is the 
most followed a Finnish radio and TV presenter and journalist. He has 
over 145.000 followers on twitter and his weekly TV audience reaches 
almost 700.000 people.
Jussi Heikelä is a Finnish radio and
 TV presenter and entpreneur. He has over 30.000 followers on twitter 
and his former morning show (2007-2015) in Radio Rock was one of the 
most listened in Finland.
Sverker Littorin is Business 
development and Corporate Affairs expert. He has been part of multiple 
companies that have been made public during his partnerships. 
All our advisors in alphabetical order (click name for more info): 


Enbuske, Tuomas (MTV, Radio Nova, YLE) 

Heikelä, Jussi (Radio Rock, Will Remember You) 

Jungner, Mikael (Microsoft, YLE, MP, Kreab) 

Levola, Juhani (Deski, Cision) 

Lipsanen, Anna-Kaarina (FiBAN, ADA-Drive) 

Littorin, Sverker (Dividend Sweden,  Momentor, Bioservo, Samtrans)

Luoma, Tuomo 	(Trainers’ House, Zeeland) 

Paananen, Tiit (Skype, Pipedrive)

Sarajärvi, Heikki (Nokia) 

Satuli, Marjaana (ICECapital, Eufex, TKPM)

Our plan is use the investment is to further develop the service and the product and build sales and marketing partnerships.
Feed of Me makes you hear what you see from the Social Media. 
Invest in audible Internet experience! Let's make the world safe!
Feed
 of Me is intended to work with Facebook, Twitter, Spotify and 
Google/YouTube. We're not currently an official Facebook, Twitter, 
Spotify or Google/YouTube partner and Feed of Me has not been approved 
by Facebook, Twitter, Spotify or Google/YouTube.
U.S. Patent and Trademark Office (USPTO) Application No. 14/947,420.

story:
Wow- You've made it this far :) .. what next?

:Great  Question

In order to acquire the needed funds for merchandise, CD Completion, manufacturing and Distribution + food and the life necessities on the road.. we are going to need YOUR Help :) 

~ We understand that everyone isn't in a position to sow a financial seed into this mighty move of God, so we are asking that you share this vision to as many people as you come across - haha (Not really.. but really) ~ We believe that word of mouth support is one of the greatest tools out when it comes to this Vision - so truthfully each ounce of support sown is greatly appreciated ~ 

~ We are taking this Vision Nationwide .. && we look forward to having you apart of the Journey ~ Lets Make today Count, Standing together and Spreading Love through the beautiful sound of music ~ Kab3Muzic 

We Set a Goal.. now lets shoot for the moon

  • So it is number time haha - We are Shooting to raise atleast $3000 for this tour to cover the main major necessities ~

    The initial $950 is going to go into the finishing production, manufacturing & distribution of our Double 5 Song EP Releases " Final Letter" By Adeana B~  & "Hope Restored" By Kyle B ~ Scheduled to drop April 14th,2018
     
  • We are Planning to Gather as MUCH Merchandise as possible for the road (T-shirts, Hats, wristbands & tons more branded items) - as this will be our greatest means of re-acquiring finances while on the road - Trusting that we can raise at least $950 to sow into this portion of the Tour ~ 
  • Finally we plan on using $1100 to cover the traveling, eating and rest stop expenses ( we know we will need much more than that, BUT we are aiming to hit this minimum target) :) 

But Why Support..What Makes YOU Different..?

~ The Impact~ 

  • We Believe that our world is in need of a wave of genuine love.. so many people feel alone and at a loss of hope.. We trust that each person we come in contact with will be uplifted, encouraged and motivated through Love to continue pressing forward
  • Over the years we have built so many awesome friendships through just being "us" - God has opened up a door for others to experience the honest compassion we posses through the spreading of our Music ~ 
  • We Vow to remain transparent in our pursuit of Bringing the #HarvestSeason Vision to fruition, opening up our platform to share memories in Love, Integrity, Joy, Peace & Hope with our Supporters in Jesus Name!

Risks & Challenges

The only complications that could come are slightly delayed perk delivery- to each person that donates, we will send a personal thank you in return - Via Text, Personal Voice Recording &/Or Video :) ~ For the Pre-Ordered Album Perks & Kab3Muzic T-shirts ~ We will be personally working extra to make sure that the perks are made and delivered on time or as close to that as possible. We are committed and excited to get you, the listener, the best possible products we can offer.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have money, DON'T WORRY! You can still help out massively! Here's how! Chances are, you're reading this on your computer or smart phone... Which means you can...

Tell someone you know, or ask your friends to get the word out and make some noise about this campaign on social media (i.e. facebook, twitter, instagram, etc.) You know a lot of people, and you have influence! :) Your voice is just as powerful and valuable! Thank you for your time, and your support. It really does mean more than we could ever explain.

story:
Resumen

 

Hola hermanos
La paz del Señor esté con ustedes!
En esta ocasión me dirijo a ustedes para solicitar su valiosa colaboración para hacer posible un sueño por el cual estoy trabajando, mi primera producción  la cual se llamará Josué 1, 9.
Este es el primer Disco que grabo como solista, sinceramente por mis propios medios, se me hace dificil hacerlo.
Quiero dar y hacer lo mejor posible para que esta producción sea de mucha bendicion y tambien sea de calidad.
 

 

 

  • El Señor me ha bendecido con el talento de la música, participando en diversos ministerios de alabanza, estando actualmente en Ruah Elohim (Soplo de Dios) ministerio que pertene a mi parroquia Santa Catarina de Alejandría en Usulutan, El Salvador y el cual es muy bendecido por la misericordia de Dios.
  • La producción consta de 15 temas donde estarán incluidos 5 temas del Ministerio Ruah Elohim
  •  Nuestro objetivo es evangelizar a través de la música y el canto y tenemos mucho interés en dirigirnos a la juventud porque creemos seriamente que en ellos está el gran presente de nuestra época moderna y la música se convierte en una gran herramienta para ser sal y luz del mundo
 

 

 

 

Lo que necesitamos y lo que obtienes

 
  • Necesitamos recaudar $5000 para poder realizar la producción
  • Recuerda que con tu colaboración obtendrás una recompensa en total gratitud por la ayuda que nos brindas. 
  • De no recaudar los fondos totales de la campaña nosotros complementaremos lo restante para que esta producción sea una realidad.
  • Los gastos de la producción estarán distribuidos de la siguiente manera:
  1. Costo por tema $250, en 15 temas $3750
  2. Costo de transporte hasta el estudio de grabación por viaje $50, Total $400 (8 viajes)
  3. Video del tema promocional de nuestra producción $450
  4. Porcentaje para Indiegogo (5%) $250
  5. Porcentaje de transferencia bancaria (3%) $150

__________________________________________ Total: $5000

 

 

El impacto

 

Esperamos esta producción pueda llegar a toda latinoamérica y que toque muchos corazones 

 

 

 

Riesgos y desafíos

 

Creemos en la providencia de Dios y también confiamos en que por su misericordia cumpliremos la meta propuesta

Si logramos sobrepasar la meta los fondos serán utilizados para iniciar con los videos de nuestra producción 

 

 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

 

La oración es de suma importancia para poder lograr nuestro objetivo, con tus oraciones nos estas ayudando de gran manera, recuerda que la oración que Dios no escucha es la que no se hace.

Otra forma con la cual nos ayudará de gran manera es compartiendo esta campaña con tus amigos y asi tambien seras parte de este proyecto

Recuerda usar las herramientas para compartir de Indiegogo.

Bendiciones

Atentamente. 

Josué Cortez

Músico Católico

story:
Hello

We are The Medlars, a seven piece contemporary folk based in London. We take influence from the folk tradition as well as rock, classical and psychedelic music.

We released our debut album "The Medlars" earlier this year and are now looking at releasing a double A-side single.

We want this release to be as much about the art and film as it is about the music itself. So we've teamed up with the filmmaker Joseph Fitz and the artist Marijke Keyser who are going to be working with us on a music video and an animation for the two tracks. Marijke is also going to be designing posters and postcards with download codes on which we'll be releasing the single instead of on CD.

Without your help in this campaign we won't be able to:

  • Record our tracks
  • Mix the tracks
  • Master the tracks
  • Pay for promotion of the release
  • Pay for the production of posters and postcards
  • Cover the costs for the making of the film and animation

So we really need your help to make this release a reality.

What We Need 

We need to raise a minimum of £2000.
This will pay for:

  • Recording for 2 days - £640
  • Mixing for 1 day - £320
  • Mastering £60 per song -£120
  • Session trumpet player (that's right we're getting a trumpet in!) - £150
  • Promotion (bare minimum) - £250
  • Covering Joseph’s costs of film (minimum) - £200
  • Covering Marijke’s cost for animation and artwork - £250
  • Printing 100 postcards with download codes - £50
  • Posters will be something that we either pay for ourselves or if we make more from the campaign we can use that to fund them.

If we don't quite raise all the money we need then we in this campaign we'll start by recording and producing the tracks and go from there. It might take years, but we'll raise it somehow!

What You Get

  • Two beautiful songs (not to blow our own trumpet but these two are our best so far)
  • An amazing music video by Joseph Fitz with your name in the credits.
  • A incredible animation by Marijke Keyser with your name in the credits.
  • You'll receive the music before anyone else.
  • We'll be releasing a limited line of posters and post cards designed by Marijke Keyser and you'll be the first (and perhaps the only) people to receive them.
  • If we make over our campaign we are hoping to record a bonus track that will only be available to those of you who contributed!

We'll be having a single launch gig next summer, it'll be one of the only opportunities to come see us live for the next year, if not longer.
You'll get eternal love (platonic) and respect from all seven of us!

How you can support us

So you can pledge to us in lots of ways.
You can buy:

  • The poster (with a download code for the tracks) - £15
  • The postcard (with a download code for the tracks) - £5
  • Download of the double A-side - £3
  • Our first album "The Medlars" - £7
  • Ticket to our Single launch - £10

 

The Impact

As many of you may know it's becoming more and more common for musicians and bands to start crowd funders for their releases.
We released our first album off our own backs and we are still feeling the weight of those costs today. 
Without your help we would not be able to carry on creating the music we love.
So if you love music that hasn't become commercialised and like what we've done in the past then please support our campaign

The next year

So we have a lot of work to get started, what with the recording, mixing, mastering, promoting and production of films and posters, but we cannot wait to be in the studio again and to be sharing our music, film and art with you!

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute with money, but you can still help us.

  • You can share our campaign through social media
  • Tell people in person
  • Share through Indiegogo
  • Give us a like or follow us on social media

 

Thank you for supporting our campaign!

Websites

The Medlars - www.themedlarsmusic.com
Marijke Keyser - www.marijkekeyser.com
Joseph Fitz - www.josephfitz.com

How you can support us
So you can pledge to us in lots of ways.You can buy:

The poster (with a download code for the tracks) - £15
The postcard (with a download code for the tracks) - £5
Download of the double A-side - £3
Our first album "The Medlars" - £7
Ticket to our Single launch - £10

 

The Impact
As many of you may know it's becoming more and more common for musicians and bands to start crowd funders for their releases.We released our first album off our own backs and we are still feeling the weight of those costs today. Without your help we would not be able to carry on creating the music we love.So if you love music that hasn't become commercialised and like what we've done in the past then please support our campaign

The next year
So we have a lot of work to get started, what with the recording, mixing, mastering, promoting and production of films and posters, but we cannot wait to be in the studio again and to be sharing our music, film and art with you!

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone can contribute with money, but you can still help us.

You can share our campaign through social media
Tell people in person
Share through Indiegogo
Give us a like or follow us on social media

 
Thank you for supporting our campaign!
Websites
The Medlars - www.themedlarsmusic.comMarijke Keyser - www.marijkekeyser.comJoseph Fitz - www.josephfitz.com

story:
Hello Everybody!

Hello everybody I'm Fatih Kömürcü 
I'm student at Mimar Sinan Fine Arts University. I take journies with only human power without 
using any motor vehicles. I've been spending my time and energy to 
achieve my ultimate goal for 2,5 years.During this period, I crossed the Marmara Sea 
from south to the north by rowing just in 3 days.After that, I walked 1600 kilometers from 
Georgia border to Bulgaria borderin 51 days to draw attention to breast cancer.My next journey was that i started from Istanbulpassed 4 countries, 6700 kilometers in total by bicycle in 66 days to raise donation for deprived children.For the same reason, I cycled to leave a 
donation letter to the municipalitiesmore than 30 cities in Turkey.And now, I want to achieve my dream.I want to row to cross Atlantic Ocean. And I need $30.000

So, I decided to start a donation campaign. My next destination is going to start from 
Moroccoand finish in America by rowing.The distance is going to be 5000 kilometers 
and I'm planning to finish in 90 days. I know how hard this journey is and I know I 
have to prepare myself well. I'll do my best.

With $30.000 I'm going to supply the expenses of the boat

Equipments for the boat

Shipping, transportation, accomodation, 
the official proceedings

food and workout of the journey

I'll be waiting for your supports to achieve my 
biggest dream and goal.The smallest donation will contribute big.

Thanks everyone!

story:
EFAN es una empresa de entretenimiento que trabaja los tiempos muertos de los eventos musicales o deportivos.

Brindando WI FI e INTERNET , colocando pantallas que te inviten a jugar , consiguiendo sponsors que patrocinen los juegos , se puede mejorar la experiencia del evento trabajando la agenda y generando contenido para las horas antes o después del show .

Ofrecemos un servicio gratuito para el FAN y para el Evento , por medio de tecnología y creatividad generamos espacios para divertirse y mantenerse conectado o mas sumergido dentro del show .  

Personalizar tu evento .  Tener el control remoto del show desde tu TELEFONO .. Hacerlo a tu medida .

Somos una empresa de tecnología asociada con empresas de publicidad .   

Todo esto es posible solo si se unen todas las partes .   Apoyando nuestra campaña logramos poner mas pantallas , mas zonas de juegos y mejor creatividad en el entretenimiento para que el evento sea unico !!

  • Quienes nos apoyen conseguirán entradas gratuitas a los eventos o shows .
  • Creemos poder llevar a toda la región la idea y mejorar los espectáculos ya sea deportivos o musicales . 

 Le pagamos a los productores del show y les llevamos mas sponsors .  Por consecuente es WIN - WIN para todos .

Los espectadores tienen mas entretenimiento y la pasan genial .

Los productores tienen una app para poder transmitir los contenidos de prensa en HD .

Los sponsors llegan a mas de 30.000 personas por show en forma diferencial e identificado .

Mientras mas recaudemos , mas podemos invertir en pagarles a los eventos y mayor aceptación tendrán nuestras propuestas en los productores porque les ingresa mas dinero .

Nuestro equipo comercial , mientras mas recauda , mas posibilidades tienen de hacer acuerdos con lugares de comida o bebidas cercanos al evento , para conseguir beneficios antes o después del evento .  Necesitamos expandirnos .

Mientras mas recaudamos , mayor es la inversión en CHALLENGES de marcas , SORTEOS patrocinados .  Las marcas necesitan invertir en contenido digital y estar mas cerca de los clientes . Actualmente lo hacen sin tener retorno ni conocimiento de las personas . Para las marcas es la posibilidad de estar en las redes y con los usuarios de una forma mas efectiva .

 Te imaginas ir a un show y ganarte la guitarra del artista ? Ganarte un sorteo para ver el ROCK en RIO ?? o la final de la CHAMPIONS ?  

En caso de no llegar a la meta total, nuestros aportantes podrán obtener entradas con ubicaciones preferenciales ,  participar de actividades especiales con los artistas o bien contenido exclusivo HD pactado con el productor del evento y con el espectáculo .

Creemos que Nuestra App va a lograr millones de usuarios .

Estamos en tratativas para el 2017 con los principales eventos deportivos y musicales del año .

Por temas de confidencialidad , no podemos divulgar aun los eventos que ya van a contar con nuestros servicios  . Esperamos en el primer año poder hacer mas de 12 eventos de 50.000 espectadores cada uno . 

El año que viene creemos poder realizar mas e 30 eventos , no solo por todo Argentina  sino también por latino america ya que el formato de festivales se repite en todos lados .

story:
Hola, soy Luis Escobar. Soy un recién graduado de la Licenciatura en Música de la Universidad del Valle de Guatemala (UVG), tengo 25 años y me he especializado en la ejecución de la Guitarra Clásica.

Recientemente recibí la buena noticia de ser admitido en el programa de Maestría en Interpretación de Guitarra Clásica en la Universidad de Alicante (España). Esta es una oportunidad muy valiosa para mí y para mi país, ya que estamos convencidos de que la ciencia, el arte y la cultura son pilares sólidos para una sociedad más justa y emprendedora.

Con su apoyo para que pueda finalizar exitosamente este programa, habrá contribuido al hecho de que no solo yo, sino muchos guitarristas y músicos guatemaltecos tengan la oportunidad de mejorar la cultura artística del país. Con su valioso aporte estará ayudando a progresar en las aulas de las universidades y escuelas de nuestra nación para que muchos jóvenes despierten su pasión por el arte y muchos otros caminos profesionales destinados a la humanización de la sociedad, que ahora tanto se necesita.

Por supuesto, este gran proyecto va más allá de un programa de maestría; ya que con esta visión será posible abrir el espacio para que más guatemaltecos puedan aprovechar esta y otras grandes oportunidades en todo el mundo. Este es solo el primer paso para lograr que la calidad artística en mi entorno mejore exponencialmente y que se apoyen más este tipo de iniciativas que, en conjunto, pueden contribuir a la mejora de la calidad de vida y la sensibilidad.

Este programa tiene un costo total de € 8,000 (aproximadamente $9,400) que incluye la matrícula y los pagos mensuales exigidos por la Universidad. Es por eso que solicito su generosa ayuda para comenzar este programa en enero de 2019 y regresar a mi país con la experiencia y el conocimiento necesarios para contribuir positivamente en su desarrollo. Gracias por su apoyo.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi, I'm Luis Escobar. I am a recent graduate of the Bachelor of Music at Universidad del Valle de Guatemala (UVG), I am 25 years old and I have specialized in Classical Guitar Performance.

Recently I received the good news of being admitted to the Master's Program in Classical Guitar Performance at Universidad de Alicante (Spain). This is a very valuable opportunity for me and for my country, since we are convinced that science, art and culture are solid pillars for a more fair and enterprising society.

With your support for successful completion of this program, you will have contributed to the fact that not only me, but many Guatemalan guitarists and musicians have the opportunity to improve the country's artistic culture. With your valuable contribution you will be helping to progress in the classrooms of universities and schools of my nation so that many young people awaken their passion for art and many other career paths to the humanization of society, which is so much needed today.

Of course, this great project goes beyond a master's program; since with this vision it will be possible to open the chances so more Guatemalans can take advantage of this and other great opportunities throughout the world. This is only the first step to ensure that the artistic quality in my environment will improve exponentially, which together can contribute to the improvement of the quality of life and sensitivity.

This program has a total cost of € 8,000 (approximately $ 9,400) which includes tuition and monthly payments required by the University. That is why I request your generous help to start this program in January 2019 and return to my country with the necessary experience and knowledge to contribute positively in my development. Thanks for your support.

story:
Short Summary

WHO AM I?

Hi! I'm Douglas Allen, singer-songwriter in Nashville, Tennessee. Prior to Nashville, I made music under the moniker Blood & Dust in San Francisco, California.  I've been writing songs for the past ten years, making my first record in 2014 as B&D. I've been lucky and blessed to write songs professionally these past two years since moving to Nashville, having a song placement on CBS' Hawaii 5-0, working with various country artists, placing in several Nashville songwriting competitions, and even playing a spot on Nashville's indie radio station Lightning 100.  During this time I've been patiently waiting to release new music to YOU and the world. 

WHAT'S UP?

I'm making a record (with YOUR help of course)! My first Nashville written, recorded, and produced album. I'm calling this record "Chasing Down A Ghost" and it's a collection of songs I'm really proud of. The songs center around chasing down a person, a thing, or an idea that you just can't quite grasp and in the end you're left with just yourself, learning to love yourself, those closest to you and ultimately finding peace within.

A few months ago I became friends with Grammy-winning producer Mitch Dane of Sputnik Sound. He's a great guy but he's also a great producer (seriously, check out and listen to some of the albums he has produced). He stumbled upon some of my songs and we set up a time to meet. After hearing some of my new songs he said "We should make a record together!" I cannot lie, those words both floored me and scared me. It would mean raising ample support and a lot of hard work, how in the world could I ever do it. SOOOO, Here we are! 

I think "Chasing Down A Ghost" are the best songs I've ever written; imagine some old Motown, with a dash of Zepplin, mixed with the cleverly real lyrics of John Prine.  I humbly and desperately want to share these songs with YOU but I need Your Help. 

Here are some examples of the sounds we are shooting for:  CAMPAIGN PLAYLIST

MEET MITCH DANE

WHAT WE NEED?

Are YOU ready? I am asking for 21K. Dollars you ask? Precious Gems? Handshakes? Well my country of origin is the USA so I'm humbly asking for 21K in dollars and I'm adding an additional flex goal of 5K.

What does that cover?

  • 2 weeks studio time and recording: Sounds like a lot of time? Making a good record takes time. Every session needs to be setup and paced.  We start by arranging the songs as a road map, set up mics and tune guitars and then we take multiple runs to get the best result.
  • Mixing: After recording Mitch adds in all the cool sounds that we may not have recorded with instruments, locks in all the levels, vocals, guitars, drums etc.
  • Musicians: We are spending 14 days in the studio - having great musicians helps make that process smooth and FUN! And just like any job, I need to compensate them for their work. I could bring in an uncle and a cousin to play drums and bass but believe me, you DON'T want that.
  • Flex goals go toward mastering and distribution.

WHAT DO YOU GET? 

My team and I have worked to come up with some cool perks to reward you for your generosity, your participation, and your heart! For detailed perk breakdowns you can find them in the right column but they are pretty cool.

You'll of course get your own copy of "Chasing Down a Ghost" but what if you want more? Want a personal music lesson? A personal song or a co-write? A video blog chronicling the making of the record? A personal house show for you and your buds? A guitar - pictured below - owned by and employed by yours truly? All of these could be yours in addition to knowing you helped make it happen!

What if we don't make the goal? Where does that money go? I will still be hitting the studio! This project may take a little longer than planned. But you have my promise that anything raised goes into bringing these songs to life. 

IMPACT - WHY BOTHER?

I mean you don't have to give or be a part of this campaign :( I'd be happy to give you a hi-five in the street if we bump into each other. You can also support lots of other music out there, really, there's a lot. But with this project you get Mitch and Doug; you get two guys concerned with making really good music/art, better, you get our hearts, and our blood, sweat, and tears poured into this album.

I'm also hoping that these songs start to get played in and eventually outside of Nashville. When you give to this campaign you are making independent music live and breathe. You are a producer yourself!

RISKS & CHALLENGES

The obvious risk and challenge is that we could miss our goal. It happens - sometimes you go big and go home. It's possible that our extensive planning for this campaign falls flat. However, I've never been more encouraged and confident that this goal can be reached. The next 60 days will have my undivided commitment to make this campaign succeed with your goodwill and help.

In addition, I want to know that this isn't my first time in a professional recording studio. I want you to know we will be working from the time we get in until we leave. I've been lucky to record in Northern California and even a bit here in Nashville. It's an environment that feels like home these days. I feel confident and excited to make this music a reality.  

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP 

Can't contribute? I get it. I'm a musician - I'm eating ramen right now. But, if you have a smartphone, social media accounts, or a computer you can help us get there. You have friends and they have friends. If you share this campaign and ask them to contribute or share, then we are cooking. Indiegogo has share tools which make it easy to spread the word. ALSO reach out and become part of my street team!

Thanks for stopping by and funding "Chasing Down A Ghost", stay tuned for updates!

story:
Short Summary

I've been a songwriter/musician since I was 14 and my dad bought me a guitar for Christmas. Prior to this, it was all just for fun. However, my own family felt the effect of loss during the COVID pandemic. The music on this album started during that time and now I want to share it with all the surviving families of the pandemic.

Studies estimate that for every death, an average of 9 additional family members are effected. That means there are over 4 million people affected in the US alone and millions more around the world. The music on this album is specially dedicated to those families as a means of emotional support, inspiration and motivation.

Together, we can share this small piece of support and affect their lives in a positive way.

What We Need & What You Get

I will provide the sound engineering, mixing and producing to reduce costs.

All funds raised will be put towards advertising in order to attempt to reach all the families who have been effected. 

Perks will include a digital copy of the full album upon release and sheet music for all relevant songs.

The Impact

Your contribution will help us reach more of the people that need this support.

This music may also be purchased as a gift, if you know of a surviving family or person who needs it. While it's intended for this specific audience. It can be given to anyone who may need inspiration or motivation.

Risks & Challenges

We are short on time and currently the album is set to launch on 12 March 2021. I will work day in and day out to ensure this material get's out to this audience.  I have managed several large and complicated projects in my professional career and I will personally ensure this is music reaches the maximum number of people.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot support this campaign monetarily, then please just share it with those around you, whether on social media, personal conversation, email, etc. The more people we reach, the bigger difference we can make. To make it really easy, use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
Short Summary
I've been a songwriter/musician since I was 14 and my dad bought me a guitar for Christmas. Prior to this, it was all just for fun. However, my own family felt the effect of loss during the COVID pandemic. The music on this album started during that time and now I want to share it with all the surviving families of the pandemic.
Studies estimate that for every death, an average of 9 additional family members are effected. That means there are over 4 million people affected in the US alone and millions more around the world. The music on this album is specially dedicated to those families as a means of emotional support, inspiration and motivation.
Together, we can share this small piece of support and affect their lives in a positive way.

What We Need & What You Get
I will provide the sound engineering, mixing and producing to reduce costs.
All funds raised will be put towards advertising in order to attempt to reach all the families who have been effected. 
Perks will include a digital copy of the full album upon release and sheet music for all relevant songs.

The Impact
Your contribution will help us reach more of the people that need this support.
This music may also be purchased as a gift, if you know of a surviving family or person who needs it. While it's intended for this specific audience. It can be given to anyone who may need inspiration or motivation.

Risks & Challenges
We are short on time and currently the album is set to launch on 12 March 2021. I will work day in and day out to ensure this material get's out to this audience.  I have managed several large and complicated projects in my professional career and I will personally ensure this is music reaches the maximum number of people.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot support this campaign monetarily, then please just share it with those around you, whether on social media, personal conversation, email, etc. The more people we reach, the bigger difference we can make. To make it really easy, use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Into The Great Unknown

This is basically a pre-sell campaign for the third New American Farmers LP release. You buy the CD or vinyl now, and we can put the finishing touches on manufacturing and promoting our album release. The basics were recorded in a state of the art studio just down the street from us, so we're keeping it local. The musicians are local as well, all living here in the bay area. You may have heard of some of them! Visit our page at Bandcamp to check out our previous releases. 

Sample track from the LP:  Right Before Our Eyes

Drums: Nigel Twist from one of our favorite all time 80's folk/punk/rock bands, The Alarm, finally joins us on every track of the album this time out. He's been appearing with us on drums for our live shows for a few years now. Check out the discography here.

Bass: Kevin T. White has also been with us in the studio and on the stage for a few years now. There is NO ONE better to hold down the bottom end than Kevin. You can read Kevin's bio here. 

Lead Guitar: James DePrato has been along for this journey, as well in the studio and on stage with us for many of our live shows. His discography can be perused here. 

Pedal steel guitar:  Dave Zirbel joins us again for our 3rd release. Dave is the best in the west on the pedal steel guitar. You can check out Dave's discography here.

Nicole Storto and Paul Knowles: We do the writing, the singing, the playing, the producing, the engineering,  the managing, the booking and the driving. For more info, here's a review of our last album, The Farmacology Sessions by Elmore Magazine.

More reviews follow:

Grateful Web

No Depression

Music Morsels

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need $3000 to complete the process. We have already invested  that much into the recording of the album, so we're pretty much partners at this point once you pledge an amount. The soil is rich, the seeds have been planted, the crop is looking good...we just need your help to harvest it all. In return, you will receive a perk of your choice listed on this page. From digital download to CD, vinyl, Executive Producer role, Loyal Fan or even a 1971 Martin 12 string guitar used on the title track of the album.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, share the campaign with your network.

 

New American Farmers at Slim's

 

New American Farmers at Opus Studio in Berkeley, CA

 

Control room at Opus Studio with SSL board

 

New American Farmers at Pappy and Harriet's in Pioneertown, CA.

 

New American Farmers at Ivy Room, Albany, CA.

story:
Project Summary.

La Grande Bande is partnering with Sibley East’s Middle/High School music department to produce an educational and community program (May 8-10) for the music students at Sibley East and for the greater Sibley East region (Gaylord, Arlington, Green Isle, MN).

Each component of our proposal is designed

  • To provide creative musical programming
  • To provide well-rounded educational programming

Each part will illustrate the cultural and historical significance of the selected music in seventeenth- and eighteenth-century Europe.

About the Ensemble.

La Grande Bande is a project-based Period Instrument Orchestra founded as a non-profit organization by Michael Thomas Asmus* in 2011. We strive to create innovative, unique, and inspiring musical programs that are played on the instruments premiere audiences might have heard.

When we present “masterworks” alongside lesser-known compositions, we demonstrate the extensive musical production during the sixteenth, seventeenth, and eighteenth centuries. By using program notes, directed-educational events, or other methods, we inform our audiences about the vast array of music at our fingertips—this is crucial to our mission.

We see incredible value in resurrecting the music written by the great known and unknown masters of our past; it's a historical, cultural, and musical lesson...rolled into one. 

*Michael is a 2009 graduate of Sibley East. 

 

What We Want To Do.

Our program will provide over 225 Sibley East students with the opportunity

  • to learn about Baroque music,
  • to learn about important historical figures, and
  • to learn about uniquely Baroque instruments 

through

  • a performance/lecture
  • masterclasses, and
  • open rehearsals

presented by La Grande Bande's Baroque music specialists

We will also

  • provide the greater Sibley East community with a world-class artistic performance only available to major metropolitan areas.

Performance/Lecture.

Another educational component of our project is a 30- to 35-minute performance/lecture presented by several LGB artists. Students will be able to

  • hear demonstrations of Baroque instruments, such as the viola da gamba and harpsichord
  • learn about important historical figures, like George Friderich Handel and Elisabeth-Claude Jacquet de la Guerre
  • see their masterclass instructors perform 

Masterclass Sessions.

Our project will provide Sibley East music students with the opportunity to participate in three, 45- to 60-minute masterclasses given by LGB’s New York-based Artists. These sessions will allow students to learn about Baroque music one-on-one with our artists.

Topics of discussion include, Baroque performance practice, diction for singers, and more. Their classmates will also be able to observe these unique sessions. Participants will be pre-selected by Sibley East's music teachers.

    Open Rehearsals. 

    Ensemble rehearsals are normally off limits to the general public. As a part of this project, La Grande Bande will allow Sibley East students to observe all of our rehearsals as their class schedules permit. (We are also making our rehearsal on May 10 open to the public.)

    Having a chance to observe our rehearsals will give students, and members of the community,

    • an inside-look at how we work,
    • to see what it's like to be a professional musician, and
    • to see how much fun we have together. 

    Community Benefits.

    At the culmination of LGB's project, we will present a full-length ticketed concert ($5, $7, $10) on May 10.  The program will include an assortment of sacred and secular Baroque pieces for instruments and singers...written by some of the eras best known and unknown composers. 

    Our program booklet will include translations of non-English texts and extensive program notes, highlighting important and fascinating information about the pieces we will perform. 

    La Grande Bande is opening our afternoon rehearsal on May 10 to the general public, giving you a chance to see us in action before our concert. 

    Project Outcomes

    This program will

    • foster interest in classical music by interacting directly with our community’s young performers;
    • it will engage Sibley East music students, and the greater community, through creative, unique, and exceptional musical programming;
    • it will provide an underserved community with a high-quality artist performance.

     

    What We Need. 

    With a total budget of $9,000, we need to raise approximately $1,500 through individual contributions to make this project possible. 

    These funds will help us to

    • pay our artists (13),
    • cover artist travel/lodging expenses, and
    • pay for instrument rental (harpsichord)

    so we can create an educational program that provides many benefits to the Sibley East students and the greater community.

     

    What You Get.

    By supporting this project you will provide an incredible educational and artistic experience to more than 225 students and to a wonderful community. As a thank you, you can also elect to receive any one of our perks. 

     

    The Outcome.

    This project will make a huge impact on these students. Our project include

    • Give Sibley East music students the opportunity to learn more about Baroque Music and its important figures;
    • Allow Sibley East Students to hear Baroque instruments, such as the theorbo, the viola da gamba, and the harpsichord, played by up-and-coming young performers;
    • Foster interest in classical music by interacting directly with our community’s young performers;
    • Engage Sibley East music students, and the greater community, through creative, unique, and exceptional musical programming
    • Provide a high-class arts experience to a musically under-served community.

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't support financially, please share this campaign with your friends and family.

    We want to thank you all in advance for your generosity.

The Outcome.

Give Sibley East music students the opportunity to learn more about Baroque Music and its important figures;
Allow Sibley East Students to hear Baroque instruments, such as the theorbo, the viola da gamba, and the harpsichord, played by up-and-coming young performers;
Foster interest in classical music by interacting directly with our community’s young performers;
Engage Sibley East music students, and the greater community, through creative, unique, and exceptional musical programming
Provide a high-class arts experience to a musically under-served community.

 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't support financially, please share this campaign with your friends and family.
We want to thank you all in advance for your generosity.

story:
Backstory

Production on the Laura Walls (aka Olori) studio recording project entitled,“Free As A Child” began in January of 1994 in Chicago  with an All-Star group.

That summer of 1994, her band played two nights at the North Sea Jazz Festival in Holland with Laura receiving three standing ovations. Drummer, Terri Lyne Carrington joined the band on the second night.

Upon their triumphant return to Chicago, Laura was besieged by unbelievable news that led to a vicissitude of “life happenings”, that persisted for 25-years.

The Shocking News:
After all the other “life happening” events (the worst of which includes the shocking erasure of the studio multi-track master tape), much later, Laura’s career as a singer songwriter all but ended with a rare vocal-chord paralysis that prevented her voice from producing a tone.

Coinciding with her full recovery in 2016, came the re-discovery of two small DAT stereo rough mix  digital tapes from both the 1994 studio recording (95% original music) and from the first night at the North Sea Jazz Festival (consisting of 95% jazz standard repertoire).  Miraculously, the rough mixes from the studio project were deemed to be esthetically of 85% performance quality for a commercial release.   On Laura’s birthday, May 16, 2018, her “Olori Live At The North Sea jazz Festival” recording was released on the Sonic Portraits Jazz label receiving domestic and international airplay.

 


On the day before (May 15, 2018) Terri Lyne Carrington (now recipient of two recent Grammy Awards) and James Cammack (bassist for Ahmad Jamaal) returned to Chicago to re-record two songs for the studio album: “Cat’s Out On A Stroll” and “Free As a Child” along with a new holiday tune penned by project producer, Robert Irving III (recent recipient of two Lifetime Achievement Awards) and Laura. While in Chicago, Wallace Roney (the only trumpet player directly mentored by the legendary Miles Davis) also added his amazing trumpet to these three selections.

The First Project "Review"

In March of 1994 after receiving a preview demo recording of the Laura Walls "Free As A Child" project, Rod Echols at WHPK Radio wrote, “I feel that this project rates as one of the top two vocal projects I’ve heard this year— it stands along-side of Dee Dee Bridgewater’s latest CD… its refreshing to hear some new vocal repertoire.” 

Now in 2019 the musicians featured on the project and others agree that this project is just as fresh today. It could be that this project was just 25-years ahead of its time. Many anticipate the release as the opening of a bottle of red wine aged for 25-years.

What remains towards the completion and post-production are:

-Horn and String Arrangements for Holiday tune-

-Re-recording of two entire rhythm tracks with vocals/horns
-Overdub sessions; Vocals, horns on three tracks
-Editing Sessions (above 5 tracks)
-Final Mix Session
-Mastering Session (Combining new recordings with those from 1994)
-Artist Photo Shoot
-Album Art and Graphic Design


-Manufacturing/Shipping of product
-PR Campaign (Print media)
-Radio Promotion Campaign (including mailing to 300 radio stations)


PERKS

 

Please click on various Perk Levels to reveal the actual items included.

The perks for supporters include two beginner piano lessons. If you've always wanted to play jazz piano, but never had the strong confidence; Robert Irving III (nine-year collaborator with Miles Davis) will get you started with the basics and have you improvising after 1 session (2 one-hour lessons).

To make a contribution NOT associated with a Perk, you can select BACK IT at the top and the first window will display: MAKE A CONTRIBUTION, which allows you to give any amount unconditional.

 

-After planting an avocado seed, It takes 10 to 15 years
for the tree to bear fruit.

 


-Japanese cicadas take 13 to 17 years to gestate

 


-Chuck Berry’s “Rockit" album  released in August 1979 took 37 years and 10 months to be followed up with his next album, “Chuck” in 2017.


While we know "things take time" and that "life happens" without consulting our schedule, nevertheless, the number of roadblocks that nearly pushed this album project into obscurity are unprecedented. Funding is the last barrier to the actualization of, what promises to be, the re-birth of an extraordinarily timeless collection of music that includes an original (Irving/Walls) lyric of a classic Wayne Shorter composition (approved by Shorter), along with original compositions penned by Terri Lyne Carrington, Walter Henderson, Senabella (aka The Bronzeville Diva) and, of course, seminal songs by Laura Walls and Robert Irving III.

 

We Can Do This Together

Project Producer/Arranger Robert Irving III collaborated 9-years with Miles Davis and has produced five Grammy Award nominated projects and many others that are critically acclaimed.  Irving says, "Laura Walls is an inspiration to many and is to be recognized for her resilience and tenacity after enduring so many challenges. Musically lyrical and conceptually, "Free As A Child',  is, unquestionably, more relevant now in 2019 then it was 25-years ago and is absolutely deserving of a proper revival and release."

Thanks for being a part of the Cause to Un-Pause:  LAURA WALLS "Free As A Child" CD with donations as small or large as your heart and purse permit. You can be sure that the release of this CD project will get the attention of the music industry to become an important part of Chicago jazz history as we know it.  As a donor (or higher), your name becomes perpetually associated with the success of this project. And more than that, Laura and the musicians will be so grateful for your kind support!


Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word by sharing the link!!!
